Hi everyone, welcome to Libii pet hospital! This time you will become the pet doctor, and cure some unusual patients, they are our 4 cute pet babies ----- funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny! These lovely pet babies encountered something terrible, and need the pet doctor’s help in a hurry, and you are just the one we need!!! In this app ---- Pet Doctor, you can use many different kinds of medical instruments to treat the pet babies’ illness. Here you can do all the following things for them, such as taking body temperature, infusing, measuring blood pressure, taking X-ray picture, putting ice packs and so on. You not only have nearly 20 medical instruments to use to cure the pet babies, but also can take advantage of many toys to make them happy. No matter in the treatment process or finish treating, please don’t forget to take a snapshot for the cute pet baby! Therefore, if you really feel interested and excited about such a hospital game related to pet babies, please do not hesitate any more, join our amazing Pet Doctor, and enjoy the experience of being a professional pet doctor!!! How To Play: Open Pet Doctor, choose a little pet baby you like to start the game. At the bottom of the screen, you can choose different medical instruments to treat the pet baby, such as dragging the cotton swab to clean the wounds, dragging the tweezers to remove the wood splinters, dragging the X-ray machine onto the patient to find out the fracture parts, dragging the band-aid to cover the patient’s scatches, and dragging the ice packs to the patient’s forehead to lower the temperature, etc. Meanwhile, the band-aid, ice packs, infusion bottle have many different styles to choose. After all these treating process, you can take a snapshot for your healthy pet baby! Features: · 4 cute pet babies to choose from (funny puppy, sweet kitten, cool monkey, and cute bunny) · 19 medical instruments you can choose to treat the pet baby · Plentiful interesting toys you can choose to make the pet baby happy · A huge variety of decoration items to choose, including funny band-aid, colorful ice packs, attractive infusion bottles and so on · Pet babies will have various expressions and sounds when you are treating them · Share your healthy pet babies via Facebook or E-mail with just one click · Snapshots of your pet babies can be saved in your photo album · Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions Need You Know: This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

description: Doit.im is the smartest way to manage your tasks with the implementation of Getting Things Done (GTD) methodology. It helps you efficiently handle your tasks, whether you are busy executives or smart staff. We’ve redesigned the entire user interface to make it simpler and more convenient. Edit a task just on its view page. 6. Forward tasks to your companions and track the status of the tasks. 7. Support the customization of your avatar. * Still use to do list? It's time to try GTD and enjoy the completely different upgrading!

Do you have a secret job? A lover? An illegitimate child? Do you hang around with Mubarak's niece? If you make STRICTLY personal phone calls this is the app for you! Add a phone number to the list of ghosts and all calls to that number will not be recorded in the call list. You can choose to save the complete number or just the latest part, this will allow you a further guarantee of privacy: even if someone were to open the app, he would only see the chosen part and not the full number, thus preventing to trace it back to the owner.

Outgoing Call Blocker supports to filter outgoing calls ☆ Prohibit outgoing call for selected numbers ☆ Password confirmation before making outgoing call for selected numbers ☆ Confirm receiver before for making outgoing call for selected numbers More features: ☆ Lock outgoing call with passcode ☆ Spell out recipient names ☆ Confirmation dialog with two mode: simple (name, photo, number) & detail (simple mode plus call/sms logs ☆ Shake to confirm Important notes - Special numbers accepts exact numbers or a startWith (such as country code), endWith , contain , or do not contain , - Code may be enabled in three levels: all numbers, numbers in phonebook, or special numbers - Detail view mode will add latest sms and call logs, send SMS button to simple view mode, - Bluetooth on bypass intercepting considers only bluetooth radio status, not bluetooth device, - Speak notification works on some common languages (defined in the list), not all, - Shake to confirm also request correct code.

May day! May day! Check altitude! Hold, hold! Obstacle! Obstacle! Up-up-up-up! Obstacle, obstacle! Down-up-down! Ground, ground, altitude… Wheeeuu-uuu-uu-u…. Boooooom-Baaaaang. Bird is down. Fast Diet Guide for Android. An easy and practical tool to follow the FAST diet. MAIN FUNCTIONS * All of the main rules of the Diet Fast, the foods recommended and many useful suggestions * List of food , divided into categories, with the associated calories * List of light recipes with pictures and calories * Suggested menu (500 kcal and 600 kcal) * DIET PLAN to monitor the progress of your diet * Shopping list connected to recipes and food list * Voice command to listen to the recipe text on your Android device * Collection of links to useful resources (books, websites, Facebook pages ...) to follow Fast Diet * Search features recipes and food * Possibility to send suggestions to the developer for new functions   FOOD LIST The list of foods, divided into categories, lets you browse the calories associated with each ingredient. Clicking on single food, also, you can add or remove it from the shopping list. RECIPES Our App contains a wide selection of light recipes. You can add the recipes you like the most to your "Favourites" section. With the voice command you can also listen to the recipe text from your smartphone. Recipes are stored in local, so you can consult them any moment even if you are off line. If you want to suggest your recipes, you can send them to our staff directly from the App.   DIET PLAN Thanks to this function, you can control the walk of your diet every day. You can add your weight and follow your weight variations thanks to our statistics and a weight graphic. With few parameters (initial weight, objective weight and start date), the application will update your data while you follows your diet. SHOPPING LIST You can save your shopping list any moment. You can add foods to the list from the foods section, from the ingredients of recipes or manually. During your shopping,you can also flag the foods you have already bought and then remove them from the list. Now you can send your list to a friend by e-mail or SMS.   USEFUL RESOURCES This section contains a wide set of useful resources for your diet, such as books, websites, and Facebook pages. If you want to suggest further resources, new recipes or if you have some suggestions to improve our App, please contact us by e-mail. ******************* CONTACTS E-mail: vincenzo.bonanno@gmail.com

Weavr allows you to create interactive websites, Android apps, beautifully-typeset documents, 3D-printable models and more, using a PC, tablet, smartphone or Chromebook. You will need to know at least one of LaTeX, ImageMagick, Java, XML, HTML, Javascript, CSS, Python, PHP, Remind and OpenSCAD to use Weavr. Weavr uses Google Drive documents, so you can... * use the native Google Drive app to edit your code on your tablet or phone, not a web-based editor; * access your code anywhere you have an internet connection; use Google Drive's built-in sharing, revision control and real-time collaboration features; * get your code even if Weavr disappears; * use literate programming techniques to organise and document your code. Safely share your creations via Google+, Facebook, Twitter, Reddit or e-mail, using the Share button. The people you share with won't have access to your Google Drive source documents. -------- Create documents. Write LaTeX code using the Google Drive editor, and compile it to a printable document using Weavr. * High-quality tablet- and phone-friendly document preview. * Print documents to a Google Cloud Print connected printer. * Use any of the fonts from Google Fonts. * Use graphicx, PGF/TikZ or PSTricks for graphics. * Download documents as PDF format. -------- Create graphics. Write ImageMagick scripts using the Google Drive editor, and execute them using Weavr. * Create logos, promotional graphics etc. from scratch, or compose and filter existing pictures. * Use the output of one script as input to another - ideal for creating multiple versions of graphics. * Use any of the fonts from Google Fonts. * Download graphics as JPEG or PNG format. -------- Create apps. Write Java source using the Google Drive editor, and compile it to a working Android app using Weavr. -------- Create websites. Write HTML/PHP/Python source using the Google Drive editor, and publish it as an interactive website using Weavr. * HTML, CSS, client-side Javascript, and server-side PHP and Python supported. * Server-side scripts have (limited) storage and internet access. * Use any of the fonts from Google Fonts. -------- Create schedules. Write a document with embedded Remind code using the Google Drive editor, and turn it into a Google calendar using Weavr. -------- Create 3D models. Write OpenSCAD source using the Google Drive editor, and compile it to a 3D-printable model using Weavr. * Tablet- and phone-friendly colour model preview. * Download models as STL format, suitable for 3D printing.

description: Cette App est créé pour les Carrosseries et sert pour établir un contact directe avec les clients finaux. À travers cette application, chaque personne pourra recevoir les notifications concernant les promotions de la carrosserie (petites réparations, égratignures etc..) et demander un devis en cas de petites dommages (en compilant un simple formulaire et en mettant en ligne les photos de la partie endommagée). Cette application permet au client final d'appeler directement la carrosserie, aussi pour les urgences (en cas d'accident ou nécessité) This App is created for Bodies and serves to establish a direct contact with end customers. Through this application, each person can receive notifications regarding promotions of the body (minor repairs, scratches etc. ..) and request a quote for small damage (by compiling a simple form and by posting photos of damaged part). UPDATE February 1, 2015: We have added additional FREE content to the game! You now have immediate access to 42 coloring pages and 10 songs at no additional charge! Draw and color with music! Each splash of color causes a new musical instrument to play! Learn the names of all the instruments in the orchestra and how they sound. Works great on either a phone or tablet! "A Fun App to Spark Kids' Creativity" -- TheChirpingMoms.com "The connection between art and music is tangible and thoroughly enjoyable. This app is definitely a keeper." -- Sarah Emerling, FunEducationalApps.com PLEASE NOTE: Crayola Color, Draw and Sing is free to play. However, some options do require a purchase with real money. The SMS permissions are for the Fortumo billing service through phone carriers. ----Features---- - 10 Songs, over 40 Coloring Pages, and Draw mode! - Crayola crayons, markers, paint bucket, and animated stickers! - Each song includes 18 possible instruments; your song sounds different every time you draw! - Share your masterpiece via Facebook, email, and more! - More than 50 official Crayola colors! - A fun, creative, and educational experience for kids! ----Purchase these fun packs for many more songs and coloring pages!---- Sing Along with Linda Arnold ----If you like our app, please rate us! It really does make a difference---- ----We're happy to help!---- Having trouble with our games in any way? Please feel free to email us at mobile@legacygames.com ----Want more Legacy games?---- Website: http://www.legacygames.com Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Legacy-Games/147583481923241 ----About Legacy Games---- We’re a dedicated team of child development and software experts focused on making great apps for kids. When we first decided to make a creativity app, we watched many kids draw and color on paper and tablets. We were puzzled by the differences. We noticed that kids engaged longer in a creative experience on a screen if it was more like an interactive game. So, we decided to “gamify” our art app, to keep kids drawing and creating longer. When your child first starts playing with Crayola Color, Draw & Sing, do they “discover” the relationship between colors and instruments? Encourage them to try new colors and art tools. Suggest that they touch an instrument. What happens? Kids delight in figuring out how to unlock all the instruments in a song! Encourage them to notice how the song sounds different each time, depending on what instruments are playing. It’s a game of discovery and creation. We hope your family enjoys Crayola Color, Draw & Sing.
release_text: - The Best Value Pack is now FREE! 10 songs and over 40 coloring pages are now yours to play!

description: Find your favorite shows and movies, control your TV, and schedule DVR recordings—all with the XFINITY TV Remote app. The XFINITY TV Remote app puts a world of entertainment right at your fingertips! Find what to watch using a few taps: - Browse TV listings customized to your area - Browse an On Demand library featuring thousands of titles - Search TV listings and On Demand for any show or movie - Filter content by genre, network, HD, free and much more Control your TV and DVR: - Conveniently change channels right from the app - Tune directly to On Demand programs to watch on your TV - Schedule DVR recordings of your favorite shows, series, and movies Requirements: - Internet connection (Wi-Fi or 3G) - Compatible cable/set-top box (for TV and DVR control). Please see http://customer.comcast.com/help-and-support/xfinity-apps/eligible-cable-boxes-cable-tv-app/ for more details. - Comcast ID or Comcast.net Email Address (and Password) - Some restrictions may apply. Not available in all areas. Initial Setup Notes: Please be at home with your TV and cable boxes turned on. Messages will appear on your TV screen to help you name your boxes for easier identification and control. Compatibility and Known Issues: - Xfinity TV app supports most Android handsets running Android 2.2 and higher. - Xfinity TV app supports the Motorola Xoom tablet running Android v3.1 and later. Other Honeycomb v3.x tablets with a 1280x800 resolution should work. We will certify the application on additional tablets soon. - Xfinity TV app may work on other Android devices not listed above but it has not been designed or optimized for them. They are currently unsupported. - Xfinity TV app currently supports devices that allow more than a 16MB memory limit on applications and will automatically detect the required memory. This includes most devices. However, the AT&T HTC Aria is a notable exception and is not compatible. *Xfinity TV app supports many-but not all-Comcast set top boxes. Specifically, Scientific Atlanta set top boxes are not yet supported. Please see http://customer.comcast.com/help-and-support/xfinity-apps/eligible-cable-boxes-cable-tv-app/ for details about currently supported set top boxes.

Good old puzzles with matches They have been vexing the minds of the curious for centuries. The rules are simple: you see a figure on the screen made up of several matches, but it’s not perfect. Move, remove or add matches… and voila! The figure is complete (don’t leave unused matches though). Some problems will be surprisingly easy, and some will require an elegant solution. Most levels can be completed in a number of ways (solutions different from suggested ones are also accepted). Hints can be accessed by clicking the “Solution” button in the menu. We hope you will enjoy the puzzles just as we enjoyed creating them for the game. Good luck! SUPPORT Our Google+: http://goo.gl/Xxeb8 Our Facebook profile: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Celtic-Spear/290643634305314

description: *** IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR ULTRA STREET FIGHTER IV GUIDE, CHECK OUT MY LATEST APP I JUST RELEASED THE ULTRA VERSION!!!*** The Super Street Fighter IV: Arcade Edition Mook is the one and only way to have all of your SSF4:AE needs in the palm of your hands at all times! This guide was created by a die hard Street Fighter fan for the die hard Street Fighter fan, and it includes some of the most important information available for the advanced Street Fighter player. Look up purbeast on PSN or Xbox Live and let's get some games in :) Shout outs to Avalon for making the awesome 100% user created artwork once again, and there is absolutely no official artwork being used in this app! This is the ONLY GUIDE that includes the whole package for all characters, including the 4 new characters Evil Ryu, Oni, Yang, and Yun, and once downloaded, THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO NETWORK CONNECTION NEEDED! All of the data is self contained in the application, with the exception of Videos and Forums. This guide will help both beginners as well as advanced players progress their SSF4:AE skills to their highest potential, with the ever important FRAME DATA and MOVE DATA being included in this, updated to the new Arcade Edition specs! For all 39 characters there is a whole slew of information available for each character, including the following: - Profile section, including Health and Stun values as well as bio information. - Unique Attacks - Special Moves - Super Combo - Ultra Combos - Move Data which includes where to block, damage, stun, super meter gained, and combo ability. - Frame Data which includes the execution, active, recovery, block advantage, and hit advantage frame numbers. - Notes Section - Videos section - Forum The ever important FRAME DATA is included in this app, as well as MOVE DATA This is not the rehashed FRAME and MOVE DATA, this is from the actual Arcade Edition version of SSF4 which had a bunch of changes made. The FRAME DATA is the most accurate available at the time from the Japanese sources, and once updates are available, I will update the data in the app! The Notes section allows users to create and save notes for each of the characters. If you learn something new about your favorite matchup, simply save it in the notes for that character! If you close the app or turn off your phone, it's okay because the notes will be there when you come back! The Combos section lists 4-12+ beginner to advanced combos for every character. It also lists the Target Combos for the characters that have them. You can simply pick a character you've never used, the look up the combos, and be ready to go! The Videos section links to 4 very popular video sites where some very advanced SSF4 matches can be viewed. Not all videos will be for SSF4:AE and may be for normal SSF4 as well. You can watch videos based on the specific character you are interested in, on SF4Tube, Frame-Advantage, Option-Select, and Youtube. The Forum section links to the specific character's forum on the famous shoryuken.com website. Pros often visit the websites and also contribute to the discussions, so it is a great place for a wealth of information. So what are you waiting for … grab the one and only Super Street Fighter IV: Arcade Edition guide so that you can be hanging with the best of them in no time flat! Legal Disclaimer: This app is not an official guide or at all associated with the game's developer or publisher. All descriptions, graphics, and information are copyright to their respective owners and usage for this app falls within fair use guidelines. This app is created solely for the creators love of the game and to help others further develop their skills at the game.
release_text: 8/20/13: I have fixed the layout issues with the newer versions of the Android SDK (17 and 18). The combos should now look good on them, and the profile should also look fine now. description: نقدم للمسلمين أجمل رسايل رمضان، منها الرسائل الفكاهيه و منها الادعية لله رب العالمين . يمكنك البرنامج من ارسال رسائل عن طريق الهاتف او الفيسبوك تويتر او جوجل بلاس و جميع شبكات التواصل الاجتماعيه. البرنامج مدعم بديزاين متحرك بسيط يتناغم مع شهر رمضان الكريم . كن أول من يرسل لاصدقائة و أصحابة رسائل رمضان الكريم ... يمكنكم أيضا عمل تفضيل للرساله اذا اعجبتكم لإرسالها لاصدقاء أخرى . أعاد الله علينا و عليكم شهر رمضان بالخير و اليمن و البركات .

The 2048 PLUS is a fun, addictive and a very simple puzzle game. Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! HOW TO PLAY: Swipe (Up, Down, Left, Right) to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. When 2048 tile is created, the player wins! Smallest size app for 2048! Let's GO!

** Now with support for Deluge and Transmission also! ** Add torrents directly from .torrent file feature added! Torrent Manager allows you to take control of your remote uTorrent, Vuze / Azureus, Transmission and Deluge clients. With this app you will be able to list, add, remove, start, stop and manage the queue order all your torrents from your remote desktop. Using the already native Web APIs present in both clients (Web UI for uTorrent, Vuze Web Remote Plugin for Vuze / Azureus, Web Client for Transmission and Deluge Web UI), you can successfully manage your torrents on your Android Phone or Tablet. Native support for magnet/torrent links: just click on a magnet link to add the torrent on your client. Please visit our website for more information and tutorials on how to configure the torrent clients: http://torrentmanager.jpsfs.com Before posting a negative review due to server connection issues, please test if your server is currently running, and, if needed, you have already changed the firewall settings on both server and router. Please feel free to contact me using the support email address if you find any problem. ** DISCLAMER: This application will not download the torrents to your phone. In order to put it to good use, you should have already configured your torrent client on your pc. Please check your server configurations using your browser before testing it on this application. Keywords: torrent, vuze, utorrent, transmission, deluge, azureus, magnet, remote

description: Marble Island is a zuma-style game,It is simple but really addictive!! Your target is to eliminate all the marbles,but don't let the chain reach the end, and make more combos and chains to get the highest score. How to Play: 1. Touch the screen where you want to shoot. 2. Match 3 or more same marbles to eliminate them. 3. Making more combos to get more score,and try to get three stars in each level! Game Features: 1. Easy to Learn,but hard to master! Can you score 3 stars on every level? 2. Having 100 different and challenging levels. 3. Bombs, arrow and other interesting props are available. Keywords:Bubble Shoot.

The Most Widely Used Boating App! This version is for your tablet. With this app you get the same award-winning detailed charts as GPS plotters because it provides the fully-comprehensive, all-in-one Navionics+ package, which includes Nautical Charts, SonarCharts™, Community Edits and 1 year of Chart Updates. Tracks, Routes, Distance, Markers, Wind Forecasts, Sync my Data, Photos and Sharing! Also with US Govt. Charts! Note: all Navionics Boating apps have the same features. The difference between Navionics Boating free version and the other titles is that the free version allows you to experience the app’s functionality before you make the decision to purchase charts. This app will not run on phones. CHARTS This app includes all the value of Navionics+, combining three content layers: Nautical Charts, SonarCharts™, Community Edits, plus 1 year of Chart Updates. SonarCharts™ is an HD bathymetry map featuring extraordinary bottom contour detail great for increasing awareness of shallow waters and locating fishing areas at any depth level. Community Edits are inputs made by users and shared for all to benefit: rocks, wrecks, obstructions, buoys, etc. Refer to screenshot above for chart coverage area, for more detail and updates check navionics.com. Once purchased, Navionics charts are downloaded to the device and stored for easy access regardless of connectivity! Charts are provided for the coverage area described, you can add additional regions anytime from Menu>Charts & Upgrades. TRACKS, ROUTES & DISTANCE Record and view your tracks. Create and edit routes based on cruising speed and fuel consumption. Measure distance between two points. WIND FORECASTS Check wind predictions anytime and sun/moon cycle information. MAP OPTIONS Overlay: Satellite or Terrain. Select Safety Depth and switch to Easy View. Not available on Govt. Charts. SYNC MY DATA Automatically sync your Tracks, Routes & Markers and Photos among all your mobile devices. PHOTOS Geotagged photos appear on the map. SHARING Email, Tweet or FB your routes, tracks, photos or markers! GOVT. CHARTS Free US Govt. Charts. SEARCH Access the largest database of marine POI’s available. Search by lat/long or category for Marina, Marine Repair, Boat Dealers, etc! TIDES & CURRENTS Instant tide and current info visible on Navionics charts. CHARTS& UPGRADES √ Purchase additional coverage anytime. √ Nav Module offers more advanced route planning with ETA, distance to arrival, heading to WP, fuel consumption and more! √ Advanced Map Options gives you even greater control of your map. Highlight Shallow Area, select Depth Shading, filter Depth Contours, adjust shoreline to selected Water Level, view Seabed composition (available for select US HD lakes) and toggle Fishing Mode to locate key fishing areas. Try for free! √ SonarCharts™ Live allows you to create an HD bathymetry map in real-time. It uses sonar data either from popular chartplotters connected via NMEA 0183 compatible Wi-Fi routers or from the SonarPhone T-BOX hardware that also enables a fishfinder split-screen with Navionics charts. COVERAGE Does not include Bermuda, which can be found on Navionics Boating Carib & S. Amer. Visit navionics.com for the lake list. Navionics has certified the following Android tablets with an OS of 4.0 or higher: ACER: Iconia Tab A501; Asus: eeePad Transformer TF101, Transformer Pad Infinity-TF700T; Nexus 7 (1st & 2nd gen). HTC: Nexus 9. MOTOROLA: Xoom MZ604; NAVIOTAB. SAMSUNG: Galaxy Tab 10.1' GT-P7500, Note 10.1. ALL SALES ARE FINAL on Google Play. Navionics apps are designed to load and operate correctly with all tablets with an Operating System of 4.0 or higher. However, we cannot guarantee flawless operation on non-certified Android devices. Navionics does not support any non-certified Android devices.
release_text: • View SonarCharts™ Live, the HD bathymetry map you create in real-time. It uses sonar data either from popular chartplotters connected via NMEA 0183 compatible Wi-Fi routers or from the SonarPhone T-BOX hardware. The new chart appears as an additional layer over either Nautical Charts or SonarCharts™. SonarCharts™ Live won the 2015 Award for Innovation at the Miami International Boat Show! • Bug fixing and optimizations

description: The ultimate flight simulator is here!! Air combat simulation with fighter AI and weapon system. this free action game will provide you a lot of hours of fun and entertainment everywhere with your mobile phone or tablet!!. It's hard to control the aircraft, but did you think that it's easy to control an air striker? You have three game modes: classic, modern and invasion. Try them now. It's free. System features - Flight Simulation Template - Flight Controller - Flight AI - Weapon System - Weapon AI - Weapon Features - Modern aircraft indicator - Radar System - Camera sway

Create and share plays. Ad supported - In-app donation to remove ads or buy the separate donate version = no ads, less Android permissions Description: Volleyball Dood is a must have application for volleyball coaches. A great clipboard or playbook application, it allows users to touch and move players around on a court and then layer on doodles and text. Once happy with the image, users can then save image. Saving a series of player positions can also be used to make animations that can be shared. Can be used on phone or tablet, buy once! Features: - quick play area transitions or use multitouch to position court - move players, add pylons, refs and a ball - save/share images & animations - add text and move it around - various doodles such as arrow line or dotted line Please email me for support or feature requests: info@sportsdood.com http://www.sportsdood.com/ (post images and animations to the user forum) Visit Sportsdood.com: - Training / How-to videos - Web-based animation viewer - Download Free Windows Video Maker sample: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=152ONnfy_WM&feature=youtu.be
release_text: New - fix corrupting formation database, may need to re-create formations, apologies for the inconvenience Previous - export formation / play databases so you can easily move entire playbooks between devices (tap clipboard icon) - double tap draw main icon to toggle ability to draw and move (also in options) - support custom backgrounds, put images in sdcard/volleyball dood/backgrounds (recommend 500w x 700h or higher same ratio) - ability to delete any frame (press '-' on the frame to remove)

description: Cody the dog and Candy are getting married, but the evil witch Bruhilda is determined to stop their wedding. She has kidnapped the princess and cursed Cody to be forever lost in the world of Neverends. Immerse yourself in this awesome, mind-twisting adventure with more than 45 colorful, fun, and addictive levels. Unlock bonus levels, extra features, and new accessories. Take the game to a completely new level by playing the “expert mode”. Find the perfect solution to the puzzles to earn the golden trophy. Let the world know how smart you are by using the “Brag!” feature. Customize the appearance of your character by adding hats, glasses, masks or even changing his color. Help Cody traverse the mind-bending mazes of Neverends to save his beloved princess! Along the way, you and Cody will need the aid of other animals, also trapped in the mazes of Neverends and condemned by Bruhilda's terrible curse. The hope of all the inhabitants of Neverends now rests on you! All you have to do is HELP THE DOG, save his princess, and free the kingdom of Neverends. HELP THE DOG in his quest to cross The Enchanted Forest, The Desert of Sorrow, The Ice Labyrinth of The Cold Mountains, the Graveyard of The Lost Souls, and the Dungeons of Bruhilda's castle.
release_text: Stuck on a level? Select the new “?” button during a level to consult your elders for advice. You can use this new feature once per day on the Free Version of the game, and three times per day on the Full Version of the game. Added a brand new world with 9 new levels and brand new features! Added a means for users to review our game. Support us by reviewing Help the Dog! Several minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.

description: THIS GAME IS FUNNY! This drum pads is very funny that allow your baby to be a professionel DJ. Your little one will love this drum pads game. When they played for the first time, your todddlers and babies may not be able to correctly touch the drum pads with his/her little hand. Play the "Crazy Drum Pads" game with your baby continuously for a few hours or days, and you will be surprised at the mobile development of your baby's hands. "Crazy Drum Pads" game must be played in the presence of a mother or father, and it is encouraged for you to guide your baby through the game for a few days at first. WHEN TO PLAY! When your baby is hungry or will not stop crying, playing this game can hold your baby's attention. (The various sounds, animated shapes stimulate your baby's curiosity.) This game is exceptionally handy for mothers and fathers who spend time with their babies but cannot figure out how to spend that time usefully. This game may be too advanced for infants under 6 months old. CAUTION! Playing the application too much amount of time or leaving the children alone with the mobile phone or tablet pc is not encouraged. Please feel free notify us! Thank You.
release_text: 1.01 Game performance is improved. 1.02 Little bug fixed.

description: DEMO VERSION Flight simulator for the REFUGIO3D, Durovis Dive & Google Cardboard 3D Stereoview + Headtracking As a big fan of Flight Simulator, I had to make this game. Fly, as you were a real pilot of the city and mountains. Look at yourself in the quiet to the cockpit. (Head tracking) Real-life flying feeling with panoramic view To fly you need to get either an Android game pad or a PS3 controller. Snakebyte Controller : MODE+X If you have Problems with Controller, download the App https://www.dropbox.com/sh/2b26jagezqka08y/b_sLPlgwpr/KeyMapper.apk

This is the old version of BeyondPod for Tablets. The latest universal version (phone or tablet) can be found here- https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mobi.beyondpod Full featured Podcast Manager (podcatcher) and RSS feed reader * DISCOVER thousands of free audio and video shows from all over the world. * PLAY your content everywhere - either online or offline. * CUSTOMIZE your playlist to match your listening preferences. This is a "Lite" version with 7 day full feature trial! * Sophisticated podcast download engine gives you complete control of how many podcasts to download and how long to keep the old versions. Downloads new content in the background, so you spend more time enjoying your feeds, and less time waiting on them. * BeyondPod provides full control over what is being downloaded over your data connection. Update a single feed, feeds in a given category, or all feeds. Download a single podcast, the latest podcasts, or all podcasts for a given feed. Nothing happens without your knowledge. Podcast downloads can be scheduled to occur at a specific time, only when connected to WiFi, or only when the phone is charging. BeyondPod also offers an option to automatically (1) Turn WiFi on, (2) Update your feeds, (3) Turn WiFi back off. * BeyondPod's integrated podcast player support variable playback speed and tracks what podcasts you have listened to. There is also a configurable TiVo style "commercial skip" that lets you easily skip over content that you are not interested in. * BeyondPod's Smart Playlist automatically generates playlists based on your listening preferences. (For example: First play the 2 newest podcasts of feed A, Then play the oldest podcast of Feed B. etc.). If you follow multiple podcasts Smart Playlist is an excellent way to always listen to what you want. * BeyondPod's Home Screen Widget gives you one-button access to your podcasts, SmartPlay, and SmartPlay updates directly from your phone's Home screen. * Integration with Feedly allows you to easily import your Feedly subscriptions. BeyondPod will also synchronize the "Read" and "Starred" status of individual posts so you can read the same feed on both PC or Phone. * Assign feeds to various categories (such as News, Sports, or Technology) for convenient filtering by topic. * Use BeyondPod to discover new podcasts and RSS feeds. Search for feeds, import feeds from a variety of popular directories, Feedly, or from external OPML files. * Import any local files (music, audio books, voice notes etc) and make them playable in BeyondPod audio/video player as if they were podcasts. * BeyondPod supports Chromecast - cast your audio or video episodes to connected Chromecast devices directly from BeyondPod. * Use the Sleep feature to automatically turn the podcast playback off after predetermined period of time. * BeyondPod supports both wired and Bluetooth headsets. Like to live on the cutting edge? Subscribe to our BETA channel on Google Play! (details at: http://www.beyondpod.mobi/Android/BETA )

description: Bunco is a popular dice game dating back to the late 1800's. 以正體漢字編輯的可以離線使用的成語辭典。 ★ 正體漢字（繁體漢字，非簡體字轉換而來）。 ★ 共收錄條目二萬二千餘條，其中正文條目五千餘條，餘為附錄條目。 ★ 每個條目包括釋義、出處、拼音、注音、參考詞、近義詞、反義詞等內容。 ★ 正文條目更包含內容非常豐富的典源及典源說明。 ★ 支援漢字、通配符號？、拼音首字母搜尋。 ★ 不用連上網路，隨時隨地使用。 ★ 程式絕不窺探個人隱私。 ★ 可以將資料庫轉移到 SD 卡。 如果升級後有亂碼現象，請先刪除，再重新安裝。 有些同學反映為什麼會請求「讀取手機狀態和識別碼」權限，是因為使用了台灣一家公司的廣告，會請求這權限，但程式允許你關閉廣告，所以你也無需有任何擔心。謝謝理解！ 若你發現不能正常使用此 App，請不吝寄送郵件給作者（Google Play 的展示頁面有郵件地址），將遇到的問題、所使用的機型、系統版本反饋給開發者，我們會及時處理。 -- 搜尋範例： 1. 搜尋「不」，會找出所有包含不字的詞目。 2. 搜尋「天?」，會找出所有以天字開頭的詞目，搜尋「?天」，會找出所有以天字結尾的詞目。 3. 搜尋「不?不?」，會找出所有具有「不...不...」結構的詞目。 4. 搜尋字母「t」，會找出首個漢字聲母為t的詞目。 5. 不輸入關鍵字，按下搜尋鍵，會隨機的列出一條詞目。 成語是漢語語言的結晶，蘊含了古人的人生哲學、生命智慧。學好成語，傳承華夏文明，是我們當代人的責任。 簡體字使用者請下載《成语词典简体版》，認准開發者 Hisand Liu。 若閣下認為本應用有些許價值，請評五星，幫忙衝上教育類排行榜前列，讓更多的人來使用。 Android 平台上最好的正體中文成語辭典（詞典,Chinese idioms），是幫助你學習中華典故、拓寬知識面的好助手。 本軟體還可以連接到《國語字典》，不認識的漢字可以隨時查詢。
release_text: 成語辭典 v3.0.2 1. 重新加入“搜尋”按鈕，方便用戶搜尋。 作者說明： 升級到3.0版本之後，有一部分同學反應反而不好用了，確實是我們有問題，補發邁的太快了，導致同學們一下子無所適從。 我們做了一些小改動，重新加入了“搜尋”按鈕，希望能減輕你們的困惑。同時，也請同學們輕拍，我們開發者也不容易。謝謝大家。 特別注意，反應有廣告困擾的同學，請在輸入框輸入"closead"，然後按搜尋鍵，重新進入，你的介面就會更乾淨了。 ======================================= 成語辭典 v3.0 1. 全新介面。 2. 在正文頁面，手指左右滑動，可以切換頁面。

Tic-tac-toe (or Noughts and crosses, Xs and Os) is a game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3×3 grid. Play against the computer and against each other - Vs Computer or Vs Human 2. Change the graphics of the game - change skin (Rings, Crown, Sports, Makeup, Sstandard) 3. Players choose names 4. Choose an X or O If you want to propose marriage in an original way... or to give a hint about marriage play with the ring skin :) You should select menu - and choose a ring :) Good luck! description: Toddlers love music. This app is all about music. It has 12 classic songs and uses easily recognizable icons to empower kids to take charge of their music exploration. NOTE: Please be advised this app is NOT a video game, it only has simple animations, just amazing music and an empowering interface. Toddler JukeBox includes the following classic songs: Wheels on the Bus Old McDonald had a farm (classic with a twist) Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes. Row, Row, Row Your Boat. Working on the Railroad. B-I-N-G-O ABC Twinkle, twinkle little star Itsy, bitsy spider Miss Mary Mack Over in the Meadow Word by Word (a John Simon original about reading) ***** Review: "by Sarah" 5 Stars (December 2, 2010): My daughter is obsessed with this app! She loves playing it over and over! by ANDRELL 5 stars (October 31, 2010) Absolutely love it!!!!! Great sound quality! My little one loves it! A must have! ******* It uses easily recognizable icons to empower kids to take charge of their music exploration. They can intuitively choose which song they want to hear by tapping on the icon. They no longer depend on you to play a CD or mp3. This is as liberating for kids as it is for parents. Kids can explore the music at their own pace and play their favorite songs again and again. Meanwhile parents don’t have to stay by the remote or CD player ready to hit play over and over again. Children can do it by themselves and sing and dance until they wear the rug down! Each song is activated by a charming identifying button that is easy for kids to decode. You can also listen to the entire collection of music as a regular CD or mp3 through the speaker phone or through a stereo system of your house or car (additional hardware might be required). All songs are beautifully performed on the guitar and sung by John Simon, a renowned New York children’s artist with more than 20 years of experience singing to and with children as well as teaching music in schools. There are 3 different modes to listen to the music. Play all, shuffle all or listen to an individual song. Tipitap Apps Learning fun, fun learning. WARNING : unlike other apps we do NOT feature any animations or games. This app is about giving toddlers freedom over their music and enjoying great songs, not creating music videos or video games.

Crack! Easter is here and if you have a little one that needs to practice their colors and is ready for some Easter egg fun then hop into the Easter Egg Games Free Match Race! Have a egg-riffic blast playing with easter eggs of all colors in this timed Easter matching game that’s designed for ages 3 & up. The Easter egg game for kids is a timed three round matching game, featuring cute decorated Easter eggs of all colors. The first round in the easter kids games is 100 seconds and each after that is 10 seconds less, so your little bunny will have the time to improve each round. And the added bonus is this easter apps for free is age appropriate for toddlers (if you play with them) & preschoolers because there are not a large amount of differing icons, so matching is a Easter delight! Another delightfully fun feature to the easter toddler games that makes it even more fun then just matching- your little one must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the easter games kids shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus, and playing also promotes: -Fine motor skills. -Memory and recognition skills. -Hand eye coordination. -Early math concepts. -Color recognition and vocabulary! And to add even more bounce to the egg delights- a giggle at the start of the game will delight your little bunny and then cool, happy music will play throughout the easter free games to keep them hoppin’ and boppin’. How To Play Click matching icons to clear them from the board before time's up. You must pick matching pairs that are not diagonal, but side to side or on top of each other. (This is a good way to introduce your little ones to the concept of “beside” and “on top” and “on bottom”). The matches don’t have to be touching to be matched, but be able to be linked with a straight line or lines. When you make a match the game will show you the link in green. If your little ones need help they can press the FIND button up to 3 times each round and it will show them matches, and they can also press the REFRESH button to shuffle the tiles around so they can have different link choices. Design Team: Nancy, Deborah, Isadora, & Sophia-Rose. Have a egg-riffic time match easter eggs of all colors in the Easter Egg Games Free Match Race and let your child have fun learning through play with a Play n’ Learn App!

Berlin Audio Travel Guide Do you want to learn about the reality of everyday life during the Cold War or hear stories from the famed Golden Twenties, the time when Berlin was known as a wild, debaucherous town? Would you like to visit Prussian palaces and witness their eccentricities first-hand? Whether you are looking for insight into this city's tumultuous past or just wanting to take strolls along the rivers and soak up the urban lifestyle, our tailored tours guide you through the city. Forget about lengthy text based content and pay attention to the site itself while listening to the narrated information. Hungry and curious about Berlins culinary scene? Look out for the daily menu with the help of the browsing mode and get first hand tips to the best restaurants and bars around, from Beergardens to Taco Trucks. PocketGuide, the world’s leading audio city guide application, gives you tours by voice, revealing the best stories, insider hangouts and must-see sights in close to 100 major cities and tourist destinations. The app determines your location and a recording of your personal tour guide describes where you are – you don’t need to touch your phone or read from the screen. All the tours are developed by local experts who know their cities inside-and-out. You can choose from different themed tours, or just wander around the city and let PocketGuide inform you when an interesting site is nearby. The app can also record your trip: With one click you can create an amazing 3D video of the sights you see on your travels. You can use the GPS-activated voice tours for free as long as your phone is online, but that means you will have to pay roaming charges. If you pay to download the tours, you can use them offline, and save on the cost of roaming. We charge a small fee for downloading the offline features because we need to reimburse the tour guides and cover our development costs. Other features you can get for free include a map that works offline and free use of the 3D tour. Why PocketGuide? • TOURS OFFERED BY LOCAL EXPERTS - Browse hundreds of tours guided by people who make sure you see the most exciting places. • AUDIO GUIDED TOURS - It will guide you with clear audio cues and once you approach a sight it automatically starts to tell you about it • SHARE YOUR EXPERIENCES - During your tour you can take photos and add comments; from this PocketGuide automatically creates a 3D video which you can easily share with your friends • FIND GREAT PLACES - If you are tired, let our guides recommend you the best nearby restaurants and cafés • AVAILABLE OFFLINE - Once you download a city, the whole content works in offline mode so you don’t have to pay roaming charges • OFFLINE MAP - Get a free offline map and navigate in the city easily while avoiding roaming charges. Enjoyed the tours? Also download: PocketGuide App to gain access to 150+ cities globally.

Shop mobile with Android – anywhere, any time. It’s easy with the innovative shopping app from coop@home. Whether you’re at home, at work, on public transport or enjoying your free time – you’ll always have your own supermarket at hand. Try out the modern way of adding groceries to your basket – simply scan a product's EAN code, and it lands in your basket. With the synchronisation functionality, you can keep your baskets up to date – whether on the webshop or any of the Apps. With 3G/4G or Wi-Fi, a fast and easy shopping experience is guaranteed. The structured navigation helps you choose from our range of thousands of products. And your shopping is delivered conveniently to your door, anywhere in Switzerland and Liechtenstein. This app puts an end to the inconvenience of limited opening hours, crowded stores and long queues at the checkout – it makes shopping fun! coop@home offers: ■ 13,000 grocery items and other products for daily use ■ More than 1,200 vintage wines from around the world ■ Weekly special offers with discounts of up to 50% off ■ Weekly variations of products to try for free ■ A 10% discount on cases of 6 70/75cl wine (excluding wines on promotion) ■ Punctual, personal delivery to your door Features of this app: ■ For extra ease - scan your groceries to add them to your basket ■ Simplicity pure – sync up your baskets between Apps and Webshop ■ Delivery date selection and reservation even before you shop ■ Large-scale images of more than 13,000 products ■ 60 most frequently bought items using 'My Products' ■ Possibility to save a shopping list ■ Shopping basket can be used as a shopping list (products in your shopping basket will not be deleted, even if the iPhone is switched off) ■ Display of your shopping basket either as a list or as images ■ Convenient access to existing shopping lists and recent orders What do I have to do? ■ New to coop@home? Simply register at MyCoop ■ Already a coop@home customer? No new registration necessary, login details are exactly the same as for the Web Shop And that’s not all! As well as your weekly shop, you can also choose a creative bouquet from our flower shop, or find the right gift for a special occasion from the extensive range in our gift shop.

description: my Secure Mail is an easy-to-use, powerful and secure e-mail client which allows you to set up personal and corporate (Exchange ActiveSync) account. my Secure Mail Free is well-designed e-mail app, successfully replacing other email clients (such as Gmail, K-9 Mail, Mail Droid, Aqua Mail etc) thanks to easier, faster and more intuitive user interface. Now you can check how efficient is securing your conversation for 30 days with the free trial period. Key Features of my Secure Mail Free - Automatic setup for the most popular email accounts (gmail, yahoo, aol, etc) - Supported mail protocols: SMTP, POP3, IMAP and Exchange ActiveSync (30 days trial period) - Instant notification for incoming email through push mail (IMAP IDLE) for servers that support it (eg, Gmail, GMX, etc.) - Folders synchronization: Draft, Sent, Trash and user-created folders (IMAP) - Full support for attachments (send, receive, open, save on the SD card) - Email search – locally on the phone (off-line) and remotely on the mail server (on-line) - Security: TLS and SSL support - Modern and intuitive interface - Widgets (shortcuts to email accounts) - Extensive help and tutorials are available in the application - No banner ads my Secure Mail with cryptographic features enabled Once a license Is purchased, additional cryptographic features responsible for encryption and digital signature of emails (based on S/MIME, PKI [Public-Key Infrastructure] and PKCS standards) become available. This allows you to send secure messages and uniquely identify and verify both the sender and the recipient of signed messages sent. E-mails encrypted by the sender can be read only by the addressee because only he has a unique private key, a certificate, and a password needed to decrypt them. my Secure Mail is integrated with one of the world's widely recognized Certification Authority (CA). As a result, X.509 certificates used to verify the message signature or to encrypt email messages can be generated directly from the application in a few clicks. Key Features of my Secure Mail with cryptographic features enabled - Encryption of sent emails (3DES, AES) - Email signing using electronic signature (SHA, RSA) - Ability to import existing third-party user certificates - Easy exchange of certificates between users via a dedicated repository - Compatible with other SMIME clients (Thunderbird, Outlook etc) - Certificates are extracted automatically from e-mails (.cer, .p12, .pfx etc) - Signing, encryption and decryption of emails is protected by a password Languages English, Polish, Russian, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, French Technical support If you have questions or problems, please contact us by mail: info@mysecurephone.eu

description: Энэ бол мобайл тоглоомын апп. Улаанбаатар хотын өмнө орших Зайсан толгойн оройд Халх голын тулалдаанд амь үрэгдсэн Зөвлөлтийн дайчдын дурсгалт цогцолбор бий. Харин хормойд нь нэгэн танкны хөшөө байх. Хөшөөний суурийн нүүрэн талд “МОНГОЛЫН АРД ТҮМНИЙ ХӨРӨНГӨӨР БАЙГУУЛАГДСАН ХУВЬСГАЛТ МОНГОЛ ТАНКИЙН БРИГАД ГИТЛЕРИЙН ГЕРМАНЫ ЭСРЭГ ДАЙНД ОРОЛЦСОН ЮМ” гэсэн бичиг, баруун талд авсан одонгууд, зүүн талд туулсан зам нь сийлээстэй байдаг. Энэ бол алдарт “Гвардын танкийн 44 дүгээр бригад” -ынхны “нэг” бөгөөд түүний баатарлаг төрх, гарамгай үйлсээс санаа төрж энэхүү тоглоомыг бүтээв. Тоглоомын онцлог: Тоглоход хялбар, дэлгэц дээр товшиж буудна; Оргинал 2D график зураг; Оргинал хөгжим, шум; 5 Бүлэг 100 үе; Манай танк 3 төрөл; Дайсны танк 4 төрөл; Тоглогч та үе бүрийг 3 мөрдэстэйгээр давахыг зориорой. * * * * * Хэрэв танд ажил хэрэгч, хамтран ажиллах санал байгаа бол бидэнтэй холбогдож болно. Холбогдохын тулд имэйл илгээнэ үү. CKG Mongolia

release_text: 여러분들의 성원에 당첨확률 대폭 UP!UP! 매일매일 수많은 당첨자들이 "루비"를 가져가고 계십니다!

description: eMantra helps you to recite and learn mantras by reading the script and hearing the mantras simultaneously. By hearing the mantras repeatedly, anyone can learn these mantras without even knowing the vedic language. Among the many mantras for Lord Lakshmi Narasimha, Mantra Rajapada stotram is the most powerful mantra and is revered as “Mantra Rajan” – King of Mantra. This mantra was created by Lord Shiva himself and whoever chants this mantra would be blessed by Lord Lakshmi Narasimha with the power to overcome any obstacle in life. ******************************************* Tags: Gayatri Sacred narashima Narayana moola Stotram Tamil ganapathi chant Narasimha narasimma Meditation Divine mantra music app application chanting Gayathri narayana raja rajapada Spiritual Mantra narasimha Lakshmi pada chalisa prayer

RetroQuiz is a retro videogames quiz trivia! Boasting over 150 questions about videogame giants like Atari, Commodore, Nintendo and Sega, it is guaranteed it will keep you absorbed trying to complete one question after the other. Famous videogame consoles and home computers like VCS 2600, Lynx, Jaguar, Amiga, Commodore 64, NES, SNES, Gameboy, MasterSystem, MegaDrive, Saturn, Dreamcast, GameGear are waiting to challenge your brain! It's not another "guess the videogame screenshot" trivia, it is the real thing with tough questions about people, machines and companies that affected the videogame world. If you are a true videogame enthousiast, you will love it! Bring back old-school memories, compete with friends in leaderboards, unlock achievements, have fun and learn many secret aspects of the videogame industry! Features: * Retro 8-bit feeling * Atari World (2600, 5200, 7800, lynx, jaguar) * Commodore World (PET, VIC, Commodore 64, Amiga) * Sega World (mastersystem, gamegear, megadrive, saturn, dreamcast) * Nintendo World (nes, gameboy, snes) * Leaderboards for competing with your friends * Achievements. Try to unlock them all! * Nostalgic chiptune music (famous amiga mods) * Level background art influenced by covers, advertisements, flyers etc from the era that defined videogames
release_text: ******* Merry XMAS ******* * Christmas melodies * Snow effects * bug fixes Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

description: Si está en Acapulco o tiene planeado visitarlo, Passport Acapulco le ofrece el repertorio más completo de los principales lugares de este destino turístico. Nuestra aplicación le ayudará a localizar los principales establecimientos y eventos para su entretenimiento y diversión. Cada lugar está categorizado por la zona en que se localiza y por el servicio que ofrece, organizado de manera alfabética para facilitar su ubicación. Con un solo click podrá marcar al teléfono de cada lugar para hacer reservaciones y solicitar información; también tendrá acceso a imágenes, redes sociales, videos y obtener las instrucciones GPS para llegar al lugar seleccionado. Passport Acapulco cuenta con una sección de descuentos y promociones donde tendrá acceso a beneficios que apoyen su economía. If you are in or plan to visit Acapulco, Acapulco Passport offers the most comprehensive set of the main points of this destination. Our app will help you locate key places and events for entertainment and fun. Each site is categorized by the area in which it is located and the service offered, arranged alphabetically, for easy location. With one click you can dial the phone number of each place to make reservations and inquire; also have access to images, social networking, videos, and get GPS directions to the selected place. Passport Acapulco has a section where you have discounts and access to benefits that support their economy.

Date in Notification displays the day of the week and Calendar day in your status bar and notification area. Date in Notification shows the current day and date in the top status bar. Features: - Simple UI as all Viclands Workshop's apps. - Auto start when the phone is rebooted. - Display the full date, day of the year and week of the year in the notifiable drop down - Small app in size 1.2M only. Save lots on the battery. - Support Android tablets.

It is important to understand how the oil industry works since it is the biggest industry in the world. Couture is an easy way to browse the latest fashion, style, gear, and accessories from Tumblr blogs. ✓ Save images ✓ Share images ✓ Reblog images ✓ Like images ✓ View Tumblr dashboard ✓ Follow/Unfollow blogs ✓ Post image to Tumblr ✓ Live Wallpaper (Beta, not recommended for tablets)

The goal of the game is to get the balls through the glass by tapping on the screen and releasing the balls. Each ball you get through the cup rewards you with a different amount of points, depending on the color of the cup. If the ball misses the glass, it disappears. When you lose all of your balls, the game is over. Your earned points can then be spent on purchasing new cups, which score you more points than the basic ones. Throughout the levels, from 1 to 30, the difficulty of the game progresses. Every 10 levels the size of the cups decreases, making the game a challenging and an exciting experience!

A Desktop Multi-Messenger The App enables you to transfer text messages and images to your mobile device in an easy way! Share this content directly to an App like WhatsApp, Threema, Twitter and so forth or choose on the device what to do with it. It is easy to use. Just install, register an enjoy! After registration you will go to whatseee.com and log in with your credentials entered in the App. Just type and send. Whatsapp Remote is possible now. *** IMPORTANT NOTICE *** There is a problem on some Samsung devices. The message transfer does not work properly and only empty messages arrive. WE ARE WORKING ON IT. Please be patient. If you have registered your device, you will receive an email when fixed. *** Major aspects are: * Three level security: 1. Encrypted connections 2. Highly encrypted data 3. No data storage We use an encryption method, that does not allow ourselves to read or decrypt any data! Your messages belong to you! And finally, we delete all data that has been transferred to your device. So the is a high level of security established here.

Classic Bubble Breaker game. Select two or more connected bubbles with same color to score.The more bubbles you pop in a single click - the more points you get for every bubble.When there are no more bubbles with same color adjacent to each other,the game ends.Try to destroy all the bubbles in the game field. Each remaining bubble by the end of the game reduces your score. You can also compare your score with others by the online score ranking system. - Animated Bubbles - Undo Feature - Sound Effects - Online Ranking System(scoreloop) - Several Game Levels
release_text: New in version 2.0.0 1.Scoring system changed. 2.Slow animations for some devices fixed. 3.Global scoring added (scoreloop)

It drops only suitable cards returning others back - see highlighting hints. Think on Freecell solution, not on control Freecell Solitaire is designed specially for Android and provides 25 customization options. Choose the most suitable cardset, background, and tons of other settings to your taste! Make your own Freecell: Use custom colors for elements and album photos for the background or cards back. Thank you for your suggestions! Please contact support if you have any problems or ideas. We read comments and highly appreciate your ratings!

description: The most realistic and challenging jigsaw puzzle engine in the Market. Bored with easy square puzzles? Looking for something more challenging? Do you love jigsaw puzzles? I have something for you! No other puzzles for Android have so realistic shapes! Only in Gr8 Puzzle engine based sets every piece has a different shape, just like in real jigsaw puzzles! Gr8 Puzzle are hardware accelerated. The game uses OpenGL and 3D hardware acceleration available in your device for the best experience. This set contains 20 high quality pictures in high resolution and with various topics. See also other available sets! So, lets summarize: - 20 levels - up to 100 pieces - 3 difficulty levels - Every piece has a different shape (like in real puzzle) - Zoom in / zoom out - Pinch to zoom - Unlimited game space - Local and global best times - Hardware acceleration

Fly and survive through the Game of the Year -winning action adventure BADLAND. More than 20 MILLION players and counting! 5/5 - AppSmile 4/4 - Slide to Play 5/5 - AppSpy 9.2/10 - Multiplayer.it 9/10 - Destructoid 4.5/5 - TouchArcade "BADLAND is one of the most beautiful games on Android and one of the must download games of 2013." -- Android Authority “BADLAND is a standout game that we can’t stop playing.” -- AppSmile “BADLAND’s unique gameplay and atmosphere make it a must-download.” -- Slide to Play “BADLAND doesn’t simply look pretty, it’s an absolute treat to play” -- AppSpy “A hallmark of excellence.” -- Destructoid WINNER of Nordic Indie Sensation Award in Nordic Game 2013 WINNER of Best Project in Game Connection Europe 2012 WINNER of SCEE Award in Game Connection Europe 2012 Selected Indie Game in PAX 10 2013 BADLAND is an award-winning atmospheric side-scrolling action adventure platformer set in a gorgeous forest full of various inhabitants, trees and flowers. Although the forest appears to be right out of a beautiful fairy tale, there’s something terribly wrong. The player controls one of the forest dwellers to find out what’s going on, and discovers an astonishing number of imaginative traps and obstacles on the way. BADLAND takes side-scrollers to the next level with its innovative physics-based gameplay combined with stunning, atmospheric graphics and audio. BADLAND also features a highly original local multiplayer mode for up to four players on the same device, where the name of the game is survival of the fittest with no rules. It’s totally OK to push your rivals in front of spinning circular saws to survive. Or, if that's too rough for you, you can also cooperate with your friends and play the modified single player campaign with up to four players. - Single-player campaign with 100 truly unique levels and more coming in updates - Multiplayer mode for up to four players on the same device in 23 levels and more content in future updates - Cooperative mode for up to four players * Survive the modified single player campaign with your friends - Intuitive one-touch controls combined with innovative level design * Also with full support for game controllers - Highly immersive audio-visual gaming experience - Designed for Android phones, tablets and Android TV - Supports Cloud Save and Immersive mode - More levels and content coming in updates Now featured on NVIDIA TegraZone. Plays great with full controller support on NVIDIA SHIELD Portable and SHIELD Tablet, and Android TV. Follow us: Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/badlandgame Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/badlandgame Blog - http://www.badlandgame.com
release_text: Update #23 brings DAYDREAM levels for CO-OP: - All 10 DAYDREAM levels available in CO-OP for up to four players. - 30 new missions - 4 new achievements - Bunch of small improvements and bug fixes Thank you for all the support again! You are awesome!

description: E-mail Notifier for incoming email notification - currently for Gmail and K-9 Mail accounts (only popup for K9). IMPORTANT: ========== [Nov 4, 2013] We've just released update to our new application - Easy Notifier, which does include support for the latest Gmail application and also handles incoming SMS/MMS text messages notifications. K-9 support is not there yet, but we're working on it... Features: * On-screen preview of new email * Shows number of unread email conversations * Multiple email accounts (Gmail / K-9 Mail) * E-mail Privacy * Sound, vibration and LED * Reminders * Quiet hours feature
release_text: From v1.3.4: Improved Gmail and K-9 Mail detection code and other fixes. !!! You need Gmail 2.3.4 or older for Gmail notification. Latest Gmail (2.3.5) update will not work! description: Playful ginger kitten. Live Wallpaper. Cool free live wallpaper with a water ripple effect. It's very interactive at finger touch or by changing device position (enable accelerometer in Settings). You see the result of effect on your screen phone! Preferences screen allow you to change wallpaper settings. You can select ripple size and enable/disable accelerometer. Do NOT contains any push notifications or icon ads ! HOW TO INSTALL: Home Screen -> Long Press -> Live Wallpapers

Do you want to run 5K easily? Do you want to start running & get in good shape? Do you want to overcome laziness and lose weight? The Run a 5K! app is exactly what you need! You will be able to run 5k as soon as in 7 weeks thanks to the interval training program created by top coaches! The training’s intensity increases as you progress and the workout gradually advances. You’ll just need to do 30 minutes of interval training 3 times a week and you’ll achieve what you wish for. You can use the app outside, in the gym or even on a treadmill. You can listen to your favorite music as you walk/run while the app tells you what to do. If you want to share your results with your friends and family, you can do so by posting your running map on Facebook and Twitter after your workout. App Features: - Effective training plan from the best coaches - GPS map saved for each training session - Real-time stats of your pace, distance, time and other parameters - Audio cues during all workouts to keep you focused - Listening and managing your favorite music from the app - Motivating tips on running with each training session - Sharing results with Facebook & Twitter friends - Inspiring quotes keep you motivated while running - Synchronization of your stats & logs with an upgrade from the free version - Integration with Runkeeper, Fitbit, MapMyRun – your activities are automatically synchronized with these networks Get ready to be surprised if you think you would never be able to run 5K! Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. This app is developed for informational purposes only. You must always consult your physician or doctor before starting any fitness program. Follow us! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedRockApps Twitter: @RedRockApps Instagram: @RedRockApps

This is a traditional oriental game played with black and white stones on a 19x19 GO board. This game was invented in ancient times of China, developed in Japan and quickly spread in Europe. It is simple to learn but difficult to master and this made it great popular around the world. Rule: The winner is the player who will be first to attain five stones in a row.
release_text: 1. Fixed some crashed bugs. 2. Increase the 3 difficulties of the computer chess, the computer will automatically randomly select one.

description: Follow us on http://www.facebook.com/hinducalendarapp - Panchang for any day. Tithi (date) along with paksha (shukla and krishna), yoga, karana, nakshatra and vaar (day of week). Also shows the year, maah (month purnimant and amavasyant),zodiac of moon and the ritu (Season), along with their end times. Has Vikram Samvat, Vikram Samvat Kartak and Indian National Calendar (Saka). - Get detailed panchang view including moon rise and moon set, sunrise and sunset, Day and Night Choghadiya, Rahukalam, Yama Ghantam, Guli Kalam, Dur Muhurt and Abhijit. All calculated for your chosen location. - Griha (Planet) Positions and rise set times, (including shani, rahu and ketu). - Find all the celestial objects, nakshatras, rashis and grihas in the sky. - Support for custom location. Choose from over 3000 cities, or choose your own location. - A monthly Calendar view highlighting the Ekadashi, Chathurthi, Poornima and Amavasya. Shows the monthly list of festival. Also showing the moon phase for each date. - Save and track your own tithis. - Shows the date of hindu festivals and allows to add the festivals in your calendar.: Diwali (Deepawali), Chhath, Karwa Chauth, Holi, Maha Shivaratri, Ramnavami, Rakshabandhan etc - Also has 4 widgets showing the moon phase, and the lunar date, and one showing moon rise, moon set and sun rise sun set timings. - ** Widgets only work when app is on Phone and not on SD card **
release_text: • Save and Load Kundali added ! Manage multiple Kundalis with ease. [Use the down arrow to see more options in the Kundali screen] • Nakshatra and Pada for planets added in Kundali. • Purchase option added for removing ads [in the menu]. • New Layout for selecting screen. Small UI Changes. • Transparency added to widgets. • Minor Bug fixes.

description: ★Swim through the depths of the ocean with the Little Mermaid as she embarks on a wonderful adventure in this magical fantasy fairy tale adapted for younger readers from Hans Christian Andersen’s beloved classic.★ "It's a delightful app and one that will appeal to boys and girls alike" - Stuart Dredge, The Guardian Includes language packs for English, French, German, Spanish and Danish. StoryToys presents a magical new story from its award winning series of interactive fairy tales. Submerge yourself in the Little Mermaid’s underwater world and help her win the Prince’s heart. This beautifully rendered tale is adapted for younger readers from the original (there’s even a happy ending). Filled with wonderful illustrations, 3D pop-up scenes and a variety of fun and engaging activities, The Little Mermaid is sure to become a firm favourite. With potions to mix, music to play, puzzles to solve and dances to attend, there’s never a dull moment for readers sharing the Little Mermaid’s adventures: ★ Play some beautiful mermaid tunes with magical musical shells ★ Help the Little Mermaid prepare for the ball by doing her hair ★ Make a magical potion with the sea-witch to give the Little Mermaid legs ★ Help our heroine perfect her dance moves to impress the Prince ★ and much, much more... Now includes optional extras - a 3D Sticker Book and a Jigsaw Puzzle Pack, with lots of content absolutely free, plus the option to purchase more (this feature can be turned off in the Parent Center). StoryToys specialises in creating 3D pop-up books which look just like real books. Magical interactive pop-up scenes and games bring classic fairy tales into the digital world, seamlessly bridging the gap between books and games and making reading an activity children will love. Adapted for younger readers from the original (complete with a happy ending) Full 3D experience - it’s just like a real book 9 interactive 3D pop-up scenes with simple tasks and games to perform Wonderfully illustrated, with beautiful, colorful imagery Fully narrated in each language by professional actors Read to Me, Read it Myself, and Autoplay modes 32 beautifully presented pages of text Featuring a beautiful musical score and plenty of amazing sound effects StoryToys awards: -Two iLounge awards for best kids’ app -Winner of two Mom’s Choice gold and silver awards -Shortlist nominations for the FutureBook Digital Innovation Award -Best Kids’ App Ever winner -Winner of the Editor’s Choice Award for Excellence in Design (Children’s technology review) -Longlisted for the DBW Publishing innovation award (children’s book category).
release_text: Get EVEN MORE FUN from your StoryToys app, with our new JIGSAW PUZZLE pack, and our new 3D STICKER BOOK pack! Lots of PUZZLES and 3D STICKERS absolutely FREE! Many more available from the Store to add to your collection! 3D STICKER BOOK: - Build your own scenes using 3D STICKERS. Press the ‘Play’ button and see your scene come to life in 3D! JIGSAW PUZZLES: - Based on scenes from the story. Choose from four levels of difficulty for each puzzle, to cater for players of all ages.

Use the ‘slider control’ and ‘fine-tuning buttons’ to create the ringtone of your liking! -- Instant previewing and unlimited, high-quality ringtone conversions are built-in. Thank you for making our apps so popular!

description: Widely use by Indians... This is an advanced call/sms filter and blocker tools. Create a black list and stay safe with unwanted calls & SMS. Full featured XBMC / Kodi remote with widgets, streaming and sync capabilities. Yatse is the most complete and stable XBMC / Kodi remote available and the best rated . Take full control of your media center with complete library support, beautiful widgets, streaming , offline media sync , internal audio player , all optimized for phones and tablets. Major functions : ◆ Voice Commands : Give orders in natural language sentences ◆ Full Android Wear support ◆ Offline Media* : Download your media to your device for offline playing ◆ Internal Audio Player* : Listen to your music on your phone (Online and Offline) ◆ Offline library : List your library everywhere ◆ Modern and intuitive interface ◆ Support Multiple XBMC / Kodi devices (and centralized Mysql database) ◆ Multiple Widgets included for fast remote actions, now playing details or to list recent media ◆ Full support for Media Player Classic (MPC or MPC-HC) as an external player ◆ Cloud Save : Keep your hosts and settings across devices ◆ Stream your videos to your Android devices or UPnP / AirPlay / Chromecast devices* ◆ Send your Android media to your media center or UPnP / AirPlay / Chromecast devices* ◆ Completely configurable to make Yatse fill all your needs Features : * DashClock / Muzei extension * Support all XBMC / Kodi remote commands from optimized views or widgets * Support Android notifications and Lockscreen controls * Quickly find your media with multiple sorting / filtering and even a global search * Detailed now playing views with direct selection of Subtitles or Audio streams * Support all Android versions starting from 4.0 (ICS) * Wake on Lan (WOL) support * Multiple plugins for SMS / Call, Android notifications, ... * Send media to your media center from YouTube or browser * Optimized for speed and low battery usage even on older devices * Support themes* * API to control media center / Yatse from other Android applications And much more, just install and try . A complete Wiki is available on the website for help on installing and configuring Yatse, the XBMC / Kodi remote and your media center instances. http://yatse.leetzone.org/redmine/projects/androidwidget/wiki Please use the website for support or feature requests, as comments on Play Store do not allow me to gather enough information or contact you. description: The game for Trivia lovers! Original questions in classic categories: Geography, History, Literature, Science. - NO user submitted questions. - NO multiple choice. - NO lame questions. We love trivia games like Trivial Pursuit and Jeopardy! But we've found most trivia apps out there aren't that fun: awkward and sometimes incorrect user submitted questions, multiple choice makes questions too easy or a 25% chance guess, and good quality questions are hard to find and trivial. We've decided to do our own Trivia Game right. Designed for Phones, Tablets, and Netbooks! - If you are using a gamepad or keyboard please contact us about your experiences at http://www.Triv-ology.com -- we want to support ALL types of input! QUESTIONS - are carefully researched so people really interested in the subjects will have fun knowing the answers. INPUT METHOD - We don't like multiple choice, but typing from scratch creates a lot of ambiguity and spelling problems. We strive for the perfect balance -- we give you hangman style slots and we give you 20 letters to spell it out. If you enjoy games like Trivial Pursuit or Jeopardy, but want quality, non-multiple choice questions with a better input method, you will love this app! Free LITE VERSION has access to half the EASY and MEDIUM questions, and no HARD questions. Upgrade to FULL VERSION to access all questions pursuit. Upgrading will also remove all ads and increases Level Up Hints bonuses by x4. This app supports Google Play Games Services. Compete with you friends, earn achievements and climb to the top of the leaderboard with Classic Trivia: Questions Game! Also try our other trivia apps: Big 4 Sports Trivia (Baseball, Basketball, Football, Hockey): http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.makeitsostudios.triv.sports.google People & Places Trivia (Capitals, Culture, On Maps, People): http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.makeitsostudios.triv.pp.google Movie Trivia (Awards, Production, Quotes, Roles): http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.makeitsostudios.triv.movie.google US War History Trivia (Revolutionary, Civil War, World Wars, Modern): http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.makeitsostudios.triv.uswar.google Entertainment Quotes Trivia (Books, Movies, Songs, TV Shows): http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.makeitsostudios.triv.equotes.google Oscars Trivia (Best Actor, Best Actress, Best Director, Best Picture): http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.makeitsostudios.triv.oscars.google We love to hear feedback and ideas. http://www.triv-ology.com

description: With this app you have the map of Rome right in your pocket! It offers an interactive map that lets you browse the city at amazing detail. Additionally, it comes with a search index for locating streets, but also other points of interest such as museums, restaurants, cafés, hotels, sights and many more. After installing the app, no internet access is required anymore, neither for browsing the map nor for using the search functionality. As a result, the map loads reliably fast and it helps you reducing your data usage to stay within the limits of your data plan. Even if you're a tourist and do not have any mobile data plan at all, the map works equally well, independent of WIFI connectivity. Features: * 100% offline and up-to-date, because the map data comes from the OpenStreetMap project. * Browse the map on different zoom levels. * Display your current location on the map. * Find streets by name, but also other points of interest like attractions, museums, hotels, and many more. * In the premium edition you can also sort points of interest by their distance and apply other search filters. * Select the elements visible on the map.

If you want more widget designs, colours and want to add photos to your widgets please see our Countdown Widget PRO version. PLEASE NOTE: 1. To add events please you the Countdown APP. 2. After saving your event, to add a widget please use the add widgets feature on your phone, and choose Countdown Widget (size).

description: Do you find yourself running out of ideas to shoot? This app provides a daily randomised prompt for you, to help keep shooting and to stave off Photographer's block! Every day you'll get a notification containing your new photography prompt for the day so get out and get shooting! Perfect for everyone from professional DSLR users looking for inspiration or beginners that want some ideas to get started! Don't like your word for the day? Tough. Challenge yourself to be a better photographer by shooting subjects you haven't considered, difficult prompts can be the most rewarding! If you like photo challenges, you'll love this.
