description: Top Tip: QuizTix games work with Google Chromecast. Try sharing your screen with your Chromecast and playing in landscape on your TV. Great fun for the whole family! -- Power up your knowledge in QuizTix the collectable quiz game. Unique trivia gameplay that is fun and rewarding: answer questions to win Tix and build an audience. Collect bonuses, complete daily challenges and unlock achievements. Complete a block of seats to spin the wheel and win bonus Quiz Fizz and power-ups. Who has the biggest audience? Log in and compare your progress with your friends. Be the king of the leaderboards and build up your Tix across all games. Play solo or social. Play the full game offline, or connect with others with full social features. Stuck on a question? Ask friends for help via Facebook, Twitter and email OR use your limited question helpers to eliminate wrong answers. Features cloud saves and cross-device play. Play on all your devices and your progress syncs! PLEASE NOTE: This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game power-ups can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store’s settings.

How to install: long press on the desktop -> Set Wallpaper -> Live Wallpaper. Wallpaper optimized for phones and tablets! Flowers tulips cheerful plants , so they widen the sun and hide at night and in cloudy weather. And so says the legend about the yellow tulip bud , which was laid happiness , to which no one could get . The reason was that he did not disclose, but once beautiful flower came to a little boy with a happy smile and a tulip opened before him. Since then, happiness , good mood and charming , sunny smile accompany donated tulip. Flower and meaning varies by color, so red tulips can symbolize a declaration of love , while white represent an admission of guilt and a desire to receive forgiveness . Multi-colored tulips same girl reported that she had beautiful eyes . Tulip also can mean a wealth of and witness to love and reciprocity of feelings ! To set the mood, you can configured to include soaring bubbles, as well as to include the possibility of burst touch on the bubble.

[ Taiwan Resorts ] contains a list of more than 1400 resorts information all around Taiwan. A set of search functions are provided with in the app, such as, sorting by resorts name/address/tel , searching all columns by keyword and browsing through Taiwan counties and districts. While viewing any individual resort item, there are some simple and helpful functions to access information : 1. Making phone call to the number listed. 2. Redirect to map application with address listed. 3. Open Safari with website url listed. 4. Sending infomation of selected item through E-mail. 5. Each item can be saved to a favorite folder for later access. 6. Built in memo function allows you to add memo info to any resorts item. 7. While viewing specific item, long press (2 sec) on any item info property will trigger internet search for specific item info. 8. Using Internet search engine to search for images of any resort item. (Using finger swipe to jump through internet image search result on Cell Phone and use two finger pinch/zoom on single image)
This is a simple checkers game that takes up very little memory, but is a challenging opponent. Difficulty is adjustable. Forcing jumps can be turned on and off.

Bring the Solar System to your screen!!! Tha app is the old version of Solar System 3D. The app is written with OPEN GL ES 2.0. Navigate through planets and their moons in 3D mode. Explore their surface with detail. The position and orbits of the planets are real according to date and time. The size and orbits of planets are real (but in very very small scale), except the sun which is in very very very small scale. You have the following options: 1) Move from planet to planet and moons 2) Rotate the camera to view planets from every angle 3) Zoom in and out to get a panoramic view of Solar System 4) Toggle orbits, planet axis, moons size 5) Stop the movement, go faster, slower … or backwards 6) Hear the sound of planets (from electromagnetic waves they produce) 7) Use Spaship Mode to travel throught planets. 8) Info about planets. Use your finger to navigate and rotate the view 1) Double tap to go to next planet/moon 2) Scroll with one finger to change view angle 3) Zoom in/out with two fingers touch 4) Use three fingers to go up and down 5) Use the “Start Position” to view the current planet. 6) Use the “Go to” to jump to a planet. The Solar System includes 36 planets and moons: Sun, Mercury, Venus, Earth (with Moon), Mars (with Phobos, Deimos), Jupiter (with Amalthea, Io, Europa, Ganymede, Callisto), Saturn (with his rings and Prometheus, Epimetheus, Mimas, Enceladus, Tethys, Dione, Rhea, Titan, Hyperion, Iapetus, Phoebe), Uranus (with Miranda, Ariel, Umbriel, Titania, Oberon), Neptune (with Proteus, Triton) and Pluto. Many thanks to Torrence Griffin ( http://www.youtube.com/user/teahman ) for the beautiful music. The app works on phones and tablets. But it may take time to load on phones. Tags: solar System, Planets, Moons, Earth, Sun, Space, Universe

ความสามารถของโปรแกรม : # คำนวณเงินลงทุน: โปรแกรมช่วยวางแผนการเงินเพื่อเป้าหมายต่างๆ เช่น เก็บเงินซื้อบ้าน ซื้อรถ การศึกษาบุตร หรือเพื่อเกษียณอายุ # สินค้าออกใหม่: ค้นหาสินค้าที่อยู่ระหว่างเสนอขาย โดยเลือกตามกลุ่มที่สนใจ เช่น พันธบัตร หุ้นกู้ หุ้น กองทุน สินทรัพย์ประเภทอื่น (เช่น อสังหาริมทรัพย์ โครงสร้างพื้นฐาน ทองคำ น้ำมัน) # กองทุนเด่น: ค้นหากองทุนรวมที่มีผลตอบแทน 1 ปีสูงสุด 10 อันดับแรก โดยเลือกได้ตามประเภทที่สนใจ # สินค้าในตลาด: ค้นหาสินค้าที่น่าสนใจ เพื่อให้ผู้ลงทุนเห็นทางเลือกในการลงทุนและสามารถเลือกลงทุนได้ตามเวลาที่ต้องการ โดยไม่ต้องรอเฉพาะ IPO # สื่อความรู้: รวบรวมบทความ บทสัมภาษณ์ คลิปให้ความรู้ด้านการเงินในรูปแบบที่เข้าใจง่าย พร้อมแนะนำช่องทางการลงทุนในหลักทรัพย์ประเภทต่างๆ แยกตามวัตถุประสงค์ของผู้ลงทุน พร้อมฟังก์ชั่นโทรออกเพื่อติดต่อผู้ให้บริการทางการเงิน Capabilities of the program. # Calculate the investment program to help plan financial goals such as buying a house, buying a car payment for child education or retirement. # Hot New Releases: Find the product offering. Select the group of interest, such as bonds, debentures, stocks, mutual funds assets (such as real estate. Infrastructure, gold, oil). # Funds is: Find the fund with the highest return on the first 10 years were selected according to the type of interest. # Market: Find interesting. To give investors an alternative investment and investors can choose the time they want. Without waiting for the IPO. # Media knowledge: collected essays, interviews clips financial knowledge in a format that is easy to understand. And investments recommended channel types. By the objectives of the investor. And function calls to contact the Financial Services Authority.
release_text: - เพิ่มการทดลองจัดพอร์ตการลงทุน ในเมนูคำนวณเงินลงทุน - เพิ่มรายชื่อผู้ให้บริการ fund supermart - เพิ่มรายชื่อผู้ให้บริการซื้อขายหุ้นกู้กับผู้ลงทุนรายย่อยในตลาดรอง (BEX) และนอกตลาด (OTC) - เพิ่มข้อมูลพื้นฐานของหุ้นกู้ที่อยู่ใน bond supermart รวมถึงข้อมูลดอกเบี้ยเงินฝากธนาคาร และผลตอบแทนของพันธบัตรรัฐบาลเพื่อใช้อ้างอิงเปรียบเทียบ ตลอดจนเครื่องมือในการคำนวณผลตอบแทนหรือราคาหุ้นกู้แต่ละรุ่น

description: NEW UPDATE!!! Added 2 audio options for the alarm sound. The Anti Theft Alarm protects your phone by sounding an alarm when someone moves your device or unplug the charger from the outlet. When the alarm is triggered, a photo is taken and sent to your email address. Awesome and fun way to scare your friends, and secure your device at the act of being taken, by a potential burglar, thief, or anybody intending to use your phone without your authorization. Catch your friends and sneaky people trying to snoop on your phone with Anti Theft Alarm! Do your friends hack your Facebook status when you leave the room? Does your girlfriend read all your texts when you take a shower? With Anti Theft Alarm, thieves and up-to-no-gooders are greeted with a loud car alarm! It is fun way to catch friends, kids and family member accessing your device without your consent, and, at the same time, prevent your cell phone or tablet from being stolen by a thief or burglar. It has also been used as a protection and as an extra security measure for your cell phone. We have received lots of emails from users that have successful avoided the phone to be stolen, by catching the thief in the act of trying to get away with the user's device. Features: Mute function so you can set up the alarm secretly - NEW!!! Phone Charger Unplug Trigger - NEW!!! Revamped Web interface for locking and unlocking the Alarm remotely - NEW!!! Share the photos of the Snooper - Thief via Facebook, Twitter or Instagram - NEW! Receive an Email with a Photo of the Snooper - Thief! Choose your own Alarm Sound! Remote Activation by Internet (lock and unlock) Paranoid Mode (Sounds alarm even if in standby). Motion Activated Alarm Trigger Adjustable Sensitivity Password Protected Unlock 6 Unique Skins Trigger Activation Delay Control Trigger Deactivation Delay Control Lost Password Recovery Price: FREE! What can you do with our app: Scare/joke with your friends Stop curious people of messing with your phone when you are not looking Phone protection and defense, against thieves and burglars Ghost Hunting :) (whether you believe in ghosts or not, our app has been used for that) Protect your computer, purse or personal belongs while you are not looking (by placing the phone with the locked Anti Theft Alarm on top of the computer) Protect your phone while is being charged (plugged in an outlet) Add an extra layer of security, by stopping the burglar at the act of stealing it As a Motion Alarm - Motion Sensor - Motion Detector - Detect any movement If you like Anti Theft Alarm, check out Anti Theft Alarm Pro! Includes all the features above, but without ads. If you are experiencing problems with the app? Please let us know at: hi@jorli.com Have Fun! -The Jorli Team"
release_text: * Added two new trigger sounds for the alarm * Remote alarm and trigger * Charger removal alarm trigger * Better cell view web layout * Bug and Crash Fixes

description: ✭ 1 500 000 пользователей во всем мире! ✭ ✭ Эффективно и очень весело! ✭ ✭ Работает даже при закрытом приложении! ✭ Будист (от слова "будить") — это лучший способ проснуться с улыбкой на лице. С помощью этого приложения вы можете каждый день ставить будильник и просыпаться от звонков доброжелательных незнакомцев, а можете и сами будить спящих в назначенное ими время. В сообществе Будиста царит уникальная атмосфера доброжелательности и позитива. Поэтому приложение признали стартапом года на Премии Рунета. ---- НОВИНКА ---- Теперь можно выбрать будильник с заранее записанными голосами звезд Рунета и шоу бизнеса. А также просыпаться каждый день от свежего гороскопа на свой знак зодиака или интересного факта. ---- РЕЦЕНЗИИ ---- «Самый веселый проект!» — Forbes «Редкий случай, когда идея сервиса сначала возникает в России и потом клонируется в США» — Афиша «Каждое утро мы будим одного счастливчика в прямом эфире. Это очень весело!» — Comedy Club Radio «Это идея, до которой еще никто в мире не додумался. Соцсети — уже прошлый сезон» — телеканал "Россия 2" «Мне очень понравилось! Я буду в этом участвовать» — Алексей Лысенков, Авторадио «Мой любимый стартап — Будист.ру!» — Давид Ян, основатель компании ABBYY Важно, что все это: ★ Анонимно ★ Сервис анонимный и безопасный — никто не сможет узнать номер вашего телефона, а вы не узнаете номера телефонов своих собеседников. Все звонки проходят через нашу АТС. ★ Надежно ★ Сервис надежный на 100% — вам позвонят только в заданное вами время и ни в какое иное. Если вдруг в нужный момент не найдется живых Будистов, чтобы разбудить вас, то вам позвонит наш заботливый робот Будя. Устанавливайте будильник и удивляйтесь — такого количества доброжелательных, позитивно настроенных людей вы еще нигде не встречали! Читайте отзывы пользователей!
release_text: *** Самое долгожданное обновление Будиста! *** — Возможность разговаривать дольше 2 минут! * Для пользователей НЕ из России длинные разговоры пока доступны только в случае соединения с собеседником из России

★ ★ ★ Free GPS altimeter ★ ★ ★ Altimeter PRO allows you to get the altitude of your current location calculated by GPS. The altitude shown in meters and feet. Include Compass. 101 original and beautiful puzzles for kids! If your child loves puzzles then this is the game for them. Puzzles range from 6 to 8 pieces, and you can even change the difficulty. description: RadioTunes offers over 75 channels of the best music available in a variety of genres. Each one is programmed by a real channel manager who is an expert in that style of music. Find all your favorite styles including Pop, Rock, 70’s, 80’s, 90’s, Smooth Jazz, Romantic, Easy Listening, International Music, and many more! RadioTunes attracts listeners from around the globe with its unique channels and eclectic music styles. Now all your favorite music is available anywhere you want to listen. Visit our website at http://www.radiotunes.com to learn more. FEATURES: - Listen to 75+ hand-programmed music channels - Not sure which channel to pick? Explore the easy-to-use Styles list - Stream music from the app or in the background while you do other things - Control audio and view track titles from the lock screen - Save your favorite channels for quick and easy access later - New Sleep Timer feature to fall asleep to music without draining your data plan - Set data streaming preferences for when using a Cellular vs. WiFi network - Share your favorite tracks and channels on Facebook, Twitter, or by email - Optional buffer bar with data display helps you keep track of your data usage CHANNEL LIST: - Smooth Jazz - Bossa Nova Jazz - 60's Hits - 60's Rock - 70's Hits - 80's Dance - 80's Hits - 80's Rock Hits - 90's Hits - 90's R&B - A Beatles Tribute - Absolutely Mellow Jazz - Alternative Rock - Amazing Jazz Classics - American Songbook - Bebop - Bossa Nova Jazz - Café de Paris - Christmas Music - Classic Motown - Classic Rap & Hip Hop - Classic Rock - Classical - Classical Guitar - Classical Piano Trios - Club Bollywood - Compact Discoveries - Contemporary Christian - Country - Dance Hits - Datempo Lounge - Dreamscapes - Halloween Music - Hard Rock - Indie Rock - Israeli Hits - J-pop (Japanese Pop) - K-pop (Korean Pop) - Love Music - Metal - Modern Blues - Modern Rock - Movie Soundtracks - Nature - New Age - Oldies - Old School Funk & Soul - Piano Jazz - Pop Punk - Pop Rock - Reggae - Relaxation - Relaxing Excursions - Romantica - Russian Dance - Russian Pop - Salsa - SKA - Smooth Jazz - Smooth Jazz 24/7 - Smooth Lounge - Soft Rock - Solo Piano - Top Hits - Uptempo Smooth Jazz - Urban Jamz - Vocal New Age - Vocal Smooth Jazz - World Music
release_text: Welcome to RadioTunes! Formerly SKY.FM Radio. RadioTunes is a new brand for the service that was once called SKY.FM Radio. We're the same dedicated team with a new name. Our company is expanding, both in the depth of our music offering, and the breadth of our reach around the world. To facilitate our expansion, we have created a fresh brand that more accurately embodies what we strive to offer – skillfully curated music of all genres and styles for everyday listening.

description: What Am I is a fun and hilarious new, free social word guessing and charades game which you can play with your friends and family anytime, anywhere! After choosing a deck from more than 20 different categories available, you must place the phone on your forehead and from that moment on you are "transformed" into the word that is showing on the device. Your friends must help you guess what you are answering to your questions, doing mimics, or whatever they feel might work for you. The person who guesses more words correctly wins! FEATURES - - Create groups to compete and play heads up with each other - Several decks and categories for all tastes, such as Animals, Movies, Novels and many others - Totally free, no strings attached! - Choose your word language or lingo for free like English, Portuguese etc. - Unlimited fun and laughter! WIDE RANGE OF DECKS TO CHOOSE FROM - Guess TV Themes - Guess Songs - Guessing Singers - Guess 70s, 80s And 90s TV Shows - Guess Animals Kingdom - Guess Movies - Guess Novels - Guess Kids TV Shows, Cartoons And Movies - Guess Cartoons - Guess Celebrities - Guess Pokemons There are many ways friends can play, it is really up to their imagination. A tsunami , also called a tsunami wave train, and at one time referred to as a tidal wave, is a series of water waves caused by the displacement of a large volume of a body of water, usually an ocean, though it can occur in large lakes. Owing to the immense volumes of water and the high energy involved, tsunamis can devastate coastal regions. Get more info inside this APP

description: Spirit1 is a real, tuned, "over the air" FM radio app. It is NOT a streaming app which requires expensive data plans and drains your battery. The focus of Spirit is on AOSP ROMs. If you don't know what AOSP is, Spirit is likely not the app for you, and you should stick with the stock FM app. Further details: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=50954346&postcount=7641 Satisfaction guaranteed or full refund. Cancel any time on request, within 30 days. To cancel, email mikereidis@gmail.com with at least your name, email of purchase, and/or order ID or email receipt. If you're an average phone user, & don't know what Android "rooting" is, Spirit will likely not offer you much more than your stock FM app. If your phone does not have a stock FM app, it is unlikely that Spirit will work on it. Spirit is mostly for Android enthusiasts who "root" & "ROM" their phones. But it also works on many stock, "store bought" phones. Spirit Unlocked includes: - Digital audio features supported ONLY on: ROOTED Non-stock AOSP International Galaxy S/S2/S3/Note/Note2/Player, HTC One/OneXL/OneS/Evo 4G LTE/Xperia T and most Sony 2012+ devices. - RDS data display in App, Lock-screen & Notification window. RT, PS, PTY, PI & AF RadioText RT, Program Service PS, Program Type PTY, Program ID PI & Alternate Frequency AF. - Lock-screen & Wired Headset Media Button support for mute, preset, seek, volume & record. - Many settings: Audio, UI, AF, Digital & Debug categories. - Unlimited Presets & Preset Lists. FAQ / Frequently Asked Questions: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=31983089 ! IMPOSSIBLE Devices: ALL Nexus & MANY Samsung & other devices have FM purposely & unfixably disabled in hardware. No app can EVER fix that. Email for refund & explanation of Google's false "compatability" checking. NO FM for GALAXY S4/S5, Note3/Note4, Tab, All US Galaxy S/Note class phones, Motorola flagships, and MANY more I understand the price may seem high, but this is a niche app with 10,000 hours of work required over 3+ years. How many other "Real FM Radio" apps are on Google Play ? Almost none. Why ? Because Android FM is extremely difficult. Google doesn't support FM radio and carriers suppress it. Intensive reverse engineering is required. In the over 3 years since Spirit was first created, nobody else has been "crazy" enough to attempt to compete in this niche (OTA radio) within a niche (AOSP ROMs) or without (all phones with usable FM). Spirit is not a throwaway game app you play for a few days. How many hours will you spend listening to FM radio in the next several years ? How much can you save on data plans by listening to free, over the air radio versus streaming ? If you care about app quality, note CNet article "We're not paying enough for apps": http://forum.xda-developers.com/showpost.php?p=23568502&postcount=2523 I'm one developer and Spirit is my only substantial app and income. I'm trying to do a job Google said they couldn't for lack of developer resources. :) Your support for Spirit is appreciated. For tons of further info, and links to free test versions, please see my XDA section: http://forum.xda-developers.com/apps/spirit-fm Thanks ! Mike.

description: A real brain teaser where you have to move strategically to leave only one marble. It is difficult but it can be done. If you cannot manage to get down to one marble then move the marbles and reduce their number to the minimum to enter the high score table. This solitaire is also an educational game that develops forward thinking and strategy skills. Can be played landscape on a phone but best played on a tablet.

developer: キングソフト株式会社 [KINGSOFT JAPAN, INC.]
description: An application that optimizes the daily collection of information has finally been launched! We have achieved the number one spot for Popular and New and News and Magazines (Paid)! http://myfeetr.com 　 I want a more efficient way to read only the news I need. I just want to collect the information that is relevant to me. Have you ever felt like this? We understand that your time is precious and you do not wish to spend it checking the news. Now we have some good news for you! With the RSS reader Feetr you will be amazed at how easily and efficiently you can gather information. All you need to do is set up filters to pick out information that you are interested in! The application will automatically collect the right information and remove any unnecessary noise to provide you with just the relevant articles. This filter functionality allows you to sift through the articles provided by your configured RSS feeds. It removes any news that does not match your set keywords! I do not want to read articles that have been retweeted more than 100 times on Twitter! This application is also perfect for this case. It cleans up the large amounts of information coming from all your RSS feeds by removing all the noise! Please pay closer attention to this level of freedom! For example, it can also be used in the following ways: ・When you want to receive RSS feeds of all the personal blogs of famous celebrities but only want to read the travel articles. ・When you want to configure the application to receive articles on gourmet cuisine for western food, Chinese food, and Japanese food, but only want to read about the dishes that contain sesame seeds. ・When you want to catch the latest news about people you are interested in by creating an RSS feed for notifications from Twitter, Facebook, mixi, google and other SNSs. ・When you want to create an RSS feed to send you periodic Google search results so you can analyze changes in the data. With this application you can do all this, and more. Easily configure the application to receive the news that you are interested in and customize filters in whichever way you want! You can use it in an infinite number of ways! "It looks like too much hard work; I couldn't possibly do that!" If this is how you feel, then please do not worry. The application already has many articles from already configured feeds. And you can add more from your device. "I’m using an RSS reader but I’ve configured so many feeds that I always end up with many articles that I don’t want to read so I’m fed up." "Even if I do read some news, I just keep pressing the ‘Mark all as read’ button." If you feel this way, we would very much like you to use this curation application that will optimize the information just for you! This is what an application that can collect and optimize news articles looks like! Example Uses ・Collect information from RSS fees such as news sites, blogs, and more. ・Configure the URL of services that deliver search results such as Amazon, Google, or Yahoo Auctions! 　The search results are updated immediately, and you can also apply a filter before analyzing those results. ・Configure the URL of services that deliver updates from Twitter, Facebook, mixi, and more. 　Check out each others' movements to arrange appointments and give presents more efficiently. Use your own ideas to use the application in many other different ways! Even just thinking of new ways to use it can be lots of fun. Application Details ・This application is an RSS reader. ・Apply a filter to the collected articles to optimize the content just as you like it. ・Compatible with RSS searches. This application provides functionality to easily add new sites that deliver content. ・Uses a proprietary engine that allows you to add filters and RSS feeds easily and seamlessly. ・Also supports non-Japanese sites.

description: A collection of stories about how to call impure force in Russian language, for free. The Application is OFFLINE and does not need the internet connection. Database will be downloaded when the application is run first time. We recommend you to use Wi-Fi connection. Main features: 1. History – every article you ever viewed is stored in history. 2. Favorites – you are able to add articles to favorites list by clicking the “star” icon. 3. Managing History and Favorites lists – you are able edit those lists or clear them. 4. Various Settings – you may change application’s font and theme (choose one of several color themes). 5. Random article of the day widget. To see the widget in the list the application must be installed to phone memory (database may be installed anywhere). This app contains advertising.

description: Больше 1000 рецептов! Рецепты с фотографиями помогут вам лучше ориентироваться в готовке. Рецепты можно добавлять в избранное! Единый список покупок на все сборники! В приложении представлены следующие категории рецептов: • Супы • Вторые блюда • Блюда из мяса, фарша, птицы, рыбы и овощей • Гарниры • Каши • Салаты и закуски • Выпечка • И многое другое И все это можно приготовить в мультиварке! Recipes with pictures to help you better navigate the cooking. Recipes can be added to favorites! Single shopping list for all collections! Do not need an internet connection, operates in offline (offline)! Discover all the possibilities for your Multicookings! The annex presents the following categories of recipes:   • Soups   • Main dishes   • Meat, meat, poultry, fish and vegetables   • Garnish   • Kashi   • Salads and snacks   • Bakery   • And much more And all this can be prepared in Multicookings! Recipes used in the application are taken from sites: povarenok.ru, multivari.ru. From each site obtained written permission to use their recipes.

Omegler, the best Omegle interface available for Android and no ads. Omegler uses the popular service, Omegle.com, to connect you to over 30,000+ strangers using a clean and intuitive interface for Android. Omegler has no ads, no interruptions, and is completely free. - Set a custom greeting to be sent to your conversational partner when you connect or disconnect making repetitive tasks fast and easy. - Find strangers with common interests by filling out some of yours. - Spy on strangers with a common interest! - Customize chat colors and sizes! - Use Spy Mode, ask two strangers a question and watch them discuss it. - Or use Spy Mode to discuss a question with a random stranger. - Save your conversations to view later. - Have fun with message filters that alter your messages in fun and interesting ways. - Use Automators and watch Omegler automatically respond to your chat partner in entertaining ways. - Auto reconnect for fast chatting. - Connects you randomly to 30,000+ strangers - Omegler includes built in Captcha support so you can quickly fill out a Captcha and get back to chatting if Omegle requests it. - No Ads - Notifications - Clean and intuitive user interface, uses Android's default theme, Holo, to ensure UI integrity and consistency on all devices running android 4.0+. Get Omegler and chat with a random stranger anywhere, anytime, free and fast. Enjoy :)
release_text: Thank you all for your 5 star reviews and suggestions! - Notifications! - Fixed a bug where chat arrows might now show. - Minor bug fixes and other UI enhancements.

The most advanced way to train With Bkool ride with up to 100 friends at the same time, wherever they may be. Create and participate on teams and in leagues and rankings. Compete against real or virtual cyclists. The simulator works with a Bkool trainer, a Wahoo KICKR and compatible ones. 3D WORLD Extreme realism The 3D is created instantly as you pedal, in contrast to others that are recorded and feature limited scenarios. You can cover routes anywhere on Earth, with these reflecting the actual terrain. Get all the details: TRAIN When you ride at home you'll feel the same as on the road. Features: * 3D WORLD. FIRST TIME IN THE WORLD!: Cover any route on the planet, alone or with up to 100 friends. * OVER 500,000 ROUTES: Choose from thousands of options. * VIDEO ROUTES: Hundreds of video routes to make your session more realistic. * 3D VELODROME VIEW: Feels like a professional track. * MAP VIEW: Enjoy GPS sessions, in full detail. Any route in the world. * MUSIC. NEW!: Play your Spotify music to liven up your session (Spotify fee not included) * CUSTOMIZED PLANS: Set your goals. We'll generate your personalized plan so you can track your progress. * IMPORT ROUTES: Record your routes with your GPS or mobile, and repeat them at home. SHARE With Bkool ride with up to 100 friends at the same time, wherever they may be. Features: * MULTI-PLAYER: Train with up to 100 friends. At home, no matter where they are. Live! * VOICE CHAT. NEW!: Speak with your club members or opponents as you ride. * VIDEO ROUTES OF OTHER USERS: Discover new routes recorded by other users. * VIRTUAL SESSIONS: Compete against cyclists located anywhere in the world. * RANKINGS: Compare your performance by category and country, with other cyclists and friends. * LEAGUES AND GROUPS: Create or participate in sports events. You can train with up to 100 cyclists. * CHALLENGES: Change your friends or other cyclists. They'll be able to challenge you. * OPPONENTS: Include opponents in your sessions (real, robots, virtual, yourself). ANALYZE Analyze your activity and reach new heights. Features: * TRAINING ZONES: Complex calculations to define your pulse zones and strength, training with greater precision. * STRUCTURED TESTS: Check your physical state to determine your starting point and progress. * EXPORT SESSIONS: Extract your data from Bkool to analyze or share it. * ANALYSIS IN THE CLOUD: Our powerful analytical platform calculates the data from your sessions. * HISTORY IN THE CLOUD: The data is stored indefinitely.

description: Delicious, healthy and quick raw food recipes by renowned chef and author Matthew Kenney. Author of the best-selling Raw Food Real World, Everyday Raw, Everyday Raw Express, Raw Chocolate and other titles focused on the raw food lifestyle and owner of the Matthew Kenney Academy, Matthew is the foremost authority today on the raw lifestyle. The recipes in this imaginative app are culled from Matthew’s years of testing for the most nutritious, delicious and easy-to-make raw food available. The recipes are organized by appetizers, soups, salads, smoothies, entrees, and desserts and are complemented with stunning, full-color photography. Each recipe includes ingredients with a descriptive photo and the key nutritional information that makes the unique raw ingredients so important to a healthy lifestyle. If you have any hesitation about raw food preparation techniques, Matthew provides videos to guide you every step of the way, from understanding the raw lifestyle to equipment you will need to the techniques and skills each raw chef must have to take advantage of the raw food movement. Key Features: • Over 50 unique and award winning recipes; • Nutritional information and photo for each unique raw ingredient; • 12 full-length videos • Social media links and shopping list Note : This app will download additional content of 120MB on first install. Trading platform FinamTrade is designed to help you trade securities and currency on the MICEX Stock Exchange and futures instruments on FORTS. With the help of FinamTrade it will be easy for you to check out real-time quotes of financial instruments, keep up with the market, monitor your trading account, and also stay abreast of the latest market news. The main options offered by the application are: • a demo regime with a chance to trade using trial account; • to view quotes of financial instruments and indexes on a real-time basis; • the following trading floors are available: MICEX (stocks and currency), FORTS (futures). • to check a trading account and open positions; • to place all main types of trade orders; • economic calendar; • to review topical financial news; • key technical analysis indicators. Demo regime: View quotes and charts, trade on trial account with no registration and authorization in the trading system. Trial accounts are provided automatically and are pegged to a device. The term of MICEX trial account is 5 days. Trade operations: To trade on a real-time basis you need to have a trading account open at Finam. To enter the trading system use a login and a password provided for FinamTrade. Users of trader social network WhoTrades can use their email addresses and account passwords to log in. ATTENTION! Updates of quotes and charts, the execution of trade operations are possible during business hours of trading floors. During weekends and holidays information is shown as of the end of the previous trading day. If trial accounts expire, data on some instruments in the demo version may be delayed by up to 15 minutes.

OSCAR: Orbiting Satellite Carrying Amateur Radio. Some satellites carry radio repeaters that can be used by amateur radio from the ground. This application helps the amateur to know the real time position of these satellites. It shows on the map the position of the satellite, semi circle representing the approximate coverage as well as the user's position. You can switch from the menu the selected satellite. From the menu visible passes shown a window with two buttons on the top. Pressing the right (circular arrow) visible passes are calculated for the selected satellite within 24 hours. Pressing the left (arrow circular dot in the center) visible passes are calculated for all satellites for the next 3 hours. Clicking on one of the visible passes entered the 3D locator. 3D Locator. The locator uses accelerometer, the compass of the device and the calculated data to show the position of the satellite on sky from observer's position. That is, when we moves the device to the sky shows a red triangle in the position of the satellite and a dotted line showing the pass. The app calculates the orbits from the current time of the device and TLE data that www.celestrak.com obtained. The internet is used to get the maps and update TLE data. If you like the app you can make a donation to the developer from the menu extensions. v1.2 Option to manually include the TLE data in a file on the SDCard with satellites that the user wants is added. /sdcard/com.androidesimple.oscar/TLE.txt For each satellite include 3 lines like these. IRIDIUM 8 1 24792U 97020A 13350.44946552 .00000550 00000-0 18933-3 0 6234 2 24792 86.3985 133.2143 0002 005 108.3180 251.8234 14.34218916869917 From the preferences menu of the main screen mark the check "TLE data from file in SD" For now, this option is only available to donors users. v1.4 Fixed bug. The first time you do not get frequency data automatically. v1.3 Frequency data from the window "visible passes" In each satellite pass, if a letter F appears in blue, When pressed frequency data for this satellite are deployed. Data is obtained automatically the first time from: http://www.ne.jp/asahi/hamradio/je9pel/satslist.htm If you want to update later will be done by checking "Last updated Frequency data" in the preferences window.
release_text: v1.6 -Now supports latest devices (like Galaxy S5), before the menu is not displayed. -By default, more zoom in tables. -Suggested donation at screen "visible passes". v1.5 Fixed bug updating Frequency data.

description: Eine Pixi-Geschichte über Sonnenenergie im Auftrag von Wien Energie. Die bekannten Pixi-Bücher als App! Gewinner des MOMMY AWARD in der Kategorie Apps für Kinder (www.netmoms.de) Nominiert für den AKEP (Best Performance in Electronic Publishing) AWARD - großartiger Vorlese- und Zuhörspaß - viele lustige Animationen und Sounds - Vorlesetext zum Ein- und Ausblenden - Bilderpuzzle - Pixi-Basteltipp - Pixi-App-Extra: eigene Tonspur, auf der Kinder und Erwachsene eine eigene Geschichte aufnehmen können! In Idas Schule gibt es eine Projektwoche, und Ida ist in der Gruppe "Erneuerbare Energien". Doch was genau ist das eigentlich? Um das herauszufinden, fährt Ida mit ihrer Klasse zum Solarkraftwerk. Was dort mit dem Sonnenlicht geschieht und wieso alle Bürger sich am Kraftwerk aktiv beteiligen können, erklärt ihnen Idas Nachbar Klemens, der im Solarkraftwerk arbeitet. Wer hätte gedacht, dass die Sonne so viel kann? Wir sind daran interessiert, unsere Apps kontinuierlich zu verbessern. Senden Sie Anmerkungen, Verbesserungsvorschläge und Fehlermeldungen per E-Mail an apps@carlsen.de , damit wir schnell antworten können. Allgemeine Bewertungen gerne direkt unter "Bewertungen" posten. Vielen Dank! A Pixi story about solar energy on behalf of Wien Energie. The known Pixi books as an app! Winner of the MOMMY AWARD in the category Apps for Kids (www.netmoms.de) Nominated for the AKEP (Best Performance in Electronic Publishing) AWARD - Great reading and listening - Many funny animations and sounds - Reading text to show and hide - Images Puzzle - Pixi Hobby Tip - Pixi App Bonus: an extra soundtrack can record your own story to the kids and adults! In Ida's school there is a project week, and Ida is in the group "renewable energy". But what exactly is that? To find out, Ida travels with her class to solar power plant. What happens there with the sunlight and why all citizens to participate actively in the work force, they explained Ida's neighbor Clement, who works in solar power station. Who would have thought that the sun can do so much? We are interested in improving Apps continuously. Send comments, suggestions and bug reports via email to apps@carlsen.de , so we can respond quickly. General Reviews welcome to post directly under "Reviews". Many Thanks!

Everything you get from a traditional test prep book PLUS one-on-one instruction covering all the math on the ACCUPLACER. ****** “It’s like a private math classroom, but you are the only student.” John "I just love YourTeacher and the way you explain things. I felt like I was in a classroom instead of just looking at examples." Diane "I went to take the ACCUPLACER test and I scored a 41 back in April. Then I signed up for yourteacher and did all the lessons for ACCUPLACER. Then I retook the ACCUPLACER and I scored 104. I was shocked!!!!!" Suzanne "First, let me say that YourTeacher was a godsend! I am finally pursuing my goal of obtaining a nursing degree. As you know, the very first step in returning to school is the ACCUPLACER test. Since I have been out of school for so long, I was very apprehensive about the math portion. What a fabulous way to review things I had long forgotten! I took the ACCUPLACER on December 1st, and scored well above the minimum on all sections, including math. Without YourTeacher, I'm certain I would have failed the math portion miserably....and would have then been discouraged in my attempts to return to school. I can't say enough about how helpful it was." Tanya "I used the program to study for ACCUPLACER. I was able to skip 2 classes to college level. Great product!" Adam ****** Need more than practice problems to get ready for the ACCUPLACER… YourTeacher’s ACCUPLACER math test prep course covers the exact math you need to know to ace the ACCUPLACER. The app features everything you would get in a traditional math test prep course (i.e. practice problems, written materials) but ALSO includes the one-on-one instruction you need to truly learn math. Our lessons include: -Multiple video example problems (similar to how a teacher starts class at the board by explaining the examples from the textbook) -Interactive practice problems with built-in support (similar to how a teacher assigns practice and walks around the class providing help) -A Challenge Problem (similar to how a teacher assigns a higher level problem which students must work on their own to prove mastery) -Extra problem worksheets (similar to how a teacher assigns additional problems for homework) -Review notes (similar to how a teacher provides summary handouts or refers you to your textbook) ****** ACCUPLACER Math Prep Course - Scope and Sequence YourTeacher’s ACCUPLACER Math Prep Course covers the exact math you need to ace the ACCUPLACER. CHAPTER 1: WHOLE NUMBERS Addition Subtraction Estimating Sums and Differences Addition and Subtraction Word Problems Multiplication Division Estimating Products and Quotients Multiplication and Division Word Problems CHAPTER 2: INTEGERS Comparing Integers Addition and Subtraction Multiplication and Division Order of Operations Evaluation Absolute Value CHAPTER 3: FRACTIONS CHAPTER 4: DECIMALS CHAPTER 5: EXPRESSIONS, EQUATIONS, & WORD PROBLEMS CHAPTER 6: INEQUALITIES & FUNCTIONS CHAPTER 7: LINEAR EQUATIONS & SYSTEMS OF EQUATIONS CHAPTER 8: EXPONENTS & POLYNOMIALS CHAPTER 9: FACTORING CHAPTER 10: RATIONAL EXPRESSIONS CHAPTER 11: RADICALS CHAPTER 12: QUADRATICS CHAPTER 13: RATIO, PROPORTION, & PERCENT CHAPTER 14: GEOMETRY CHAPTER 15: MEASUREMENT CHAPTER 16: PROBABILITY & STATISTICS (Wifi or 3G connection required)

description: Unwetter (Gewitter, Hagel, Starkregen) können Landwirte bei ihrer Ernteplanung stark beeinflussen. Darum gibt es jetzt eine neue App, der Ihnen Unwetterwarungen Ihrer Region kostenlos via Benachrichtigung auf's Handy bringt. Jeder unserer landwirtschaftlichen Kunden kann sich kostenlos für diesen Service anmelden. Die App bietet eine Unwetterkarte für Deutschland sowie einen Benachrichtigungsdienst über neue Unwetterwarnungen für Ihr Gebiet. Um alte Unwetterwarnungen betrachten zu können ist ebenfalls ein Archiv vorhanden. Hinweise: Für die Nutzung der App ist eine Internetverbindung notwendig, damit aktuelle Unwetterwarnungen sowie die Unwetterkarte abgerufen werden können. Eine genaue FAQ-Liste finden Sie unter folgender URL: http://goo.gl/j9HQi sowie in der App selbst. Die APP benötigt folgende Berechtigungen: ---------- Standort: - Um die automatische Erkennung der PLZ zu ermöglichen. Netzkommunikation: - Um die Unwetterkarte sowie Warnungen herunterzuladen und Pushmeldungen erhalten zu können. Telefonstatus und Identität: - Um bei Anrufen oder anderen Ereignissen die App-Aktivität zu unterbrechen sowie um Ihr Gerät mit Ihrer PLZ zu verknüpfen. System-Tools: - Um bei einer Pushmeldung das Handy zu wecken. Hardware-Steuerelemente: - Um bei einer Pushmeldung die Vibration zu nutzen. Ideen, Anregungen oder Fehler können Sie uns gerne per E-Mail zukommen lassen. Die Wetterwarnungen stammen vom Deutschen Wetterdienst (DWD). Alle Angaben ohne Gewähr. Weitere Informationen unter http://www.raiffeisen.com Severe weather (thunderstorms, hail, heavy rain) can influence farmers in their crop planning strong. Therefore, there is now a new app that brings you Unwetterwarungen your area for free via notification on your mobile phone. Each of our agricultural customers can register free of charge for this service. The app offers a weather map of Germany and a notification service on new severe weather warnings for your area. To view old weather warnings is also an archive. Hints: For the use of an Internet connection is required for current severe weather warnings and weather map can be retrieved. You will find a detailed list of FAQs at the following URL: http://goo.gl/j9HQi and in the app itself The app requires the following permissions: ---------- Location:   - To enable the automatic detection of the ZIP. Network Communications:   - To download the map, as well as severe weather alerts and receive push notifications to. Phone state and identity:   - To pause the app activity for calls or other events, as well as to your device to associate with your postcode. System tools:   - To wake the phone with a push message. Hardware controls:   - To use the vibration at a push message. Ideas, suggestions or errors you are welcome to send us by e-mail. The weather warnings come from the German Weather Service (DWD). All information without guarantee. More information http://www.raiffeisen.com

Do you work shifts? Fed up of trying to work out what shift you will be working when asked about a future date? Wouldn't it be nice to have an App close at hand to tell you! Shift Work Calendar can be used to plan and organise your life around your work commitments. Keep track of your life with this Shift Work Calendar, designed to make planning easier for people who work shifts. Shift Work Calendar allows you to easily build different shift patterns by choosing your own colours and names which can be speedily added to the Calendar and visible at a quick glance. Comments can be added against individual days to note plans; e.g. appointments, events etc. Ads can be removed from the Calendar Settings menu option. Email machaiapps@gmail.com for support. Feedback and suggestions are most welcome.

description: Reckless Racing is a performance intensive game. High-end Android device recommended THE DIRT-ROAD RACING GAME YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR! Reckless Racing blends the finest top-down racer style with graphics that are so stunning you’ll shout, “Oowee!” Skid, slip, and slide through down-and-dirty racetracks with precision controls, and challenge friends in online multiplayer. Hold on tight and get ready to go. This here is Reckless Racing! Yeehaw! RACING FOR THE RECKLESS The remarkable visual power of the game puts you in the heart of Dixie, where you’ll encounter wonderfully detailed backroad racetracks. Dirt track or asphalt, truck or rally car – take your choice and then take it to the limit. Learn the basics and choose from a variety of driving controls. Progress through the races and move up through Bronze, Silver & Gold difficulty levels. BEAT BUBBA! Adapt your race skills and take on an outrageous cast of characters, including Otis, Lurlene, Cletus, Floyd, and, of course, Bubba. You’ll be hootin’ and hollerin’ along with them in no time flat! THINK YOU’RE BETTER THAN THE REST? With online multiplayer, Reckless Racing gives you the chance to show the world your racing ability! Post your best times on online leaderboards and trade ghost races with players from all over the world. Chat functionality is also built in! RACE IN 3 DIFFERENT MODES Immerse yourself in the world of no-rules driving. Take on the Dirt Rally, Hot Lap time trial, or Delivery time trial. Beat other drivers or beat the clock. Either way, there’s a lot of Reckless Racing to do!

So you've washed, dried and prepped your hair, but now you want to do something new with your hair. Enter Mahalo's Celebrity Hairstyles app. Whether you're going to your own A-list event or out for a special night out with your friends, your hair can always use a celebrity makeover to turn your tresses into a paparazzi magnet. After working your way through this app you will: * Learn the three simple steps to getting Snooki's signature 6-inch pouf * Get Madonna's 80s hairstyle without using a crimper * Stop blending into the background with supermodel hair * Create a short bob with long hair and no cutting! Plus you will: * Go from flat hair to cotton candy volume in 10 minutes * Get the royal treatment with Kate Middelton’s glamorous curls * Achieve a wild animal hairstyle but be able to detangle in minutes * Turn James Dean’s hair style into a sexy look for women! There's even more! * Turn heads with quick, hot, do-it-yourself looks * Learn tips and tricks from professional Hollywood stylists * Avoid spending $200+ at expensive salons * 5 short hairstyles so sexy you’ll want to cut your long hair! Follow along with the professional stylists from Studio DNA as they walk you through how to mimic the styles of your favorite stars. When you're done with each video, you'll be able to confidently adapt today's sexiest looks for your hair. So don't blow your next date or party with the same boring look. This app is your VIP pass to adding red carpet flair to your hair!

GO Switch Widget provides you a fast way to turn on/off the functions in common use, such as Wifi, GPS, brightness, screen lock,flashlight, battery etc. In 4x1 style, up to 12 toggles and 2 controls are supported. Compare to other switch widgets, you can just simply drag the toggles to change their positions in the widget. Moreover, like other GOWidgets, theme is also supported. To make it work, you must install the latest version of GO Launcher EX which is the most popular home launcher app in Android Market. Free tools for you: Flashlight , QR Scanner , Timer How to uninstall? To lock screen, the widget must be set as the device administrator. Once it's done, you cannot uninstall the widget directly like other normal GOWidgets. If you happen to uninstall it, you can follow the instruction below: Enter the "Settings" menu -> "Location and security" -> "Select device administrators" -> Make sure "GO Switch Widget" is not selected -> Then uninstall the Available Size: -4x1 -1x1 Since GO Switch Widget has the right to lock screen, to UNINSTALL it, you must execute the steps below first. Press the "menu" button in home screen of GO Launcher EX -> Select "Settings" -> Select "Location and Security" -> Select "Select device administrators" -> Make sure "GO Switch Widget" is not selected. Then try uninstall the widget like other usual applications. Some toggles may be out of work after your GO Switch Widget is upgraded. Please refer to the instruction below to figure them out. For the WiFi toggle (the instruction may be varied a little in different phones) Settings -> Wireless and network -> Wi-Fi settings -> Unselect “WiFi” -> Then try the WiFi toggle in the widget to open the WiFi network. For the Bluetooth toggle (the instruction may be varied a little in different phones) Settings -> Wireless and network -> Bluetooth settings -> Unselect “Bluetooth” -> Then try the Bluetooth toggle in the widget to open the Bluetooth function. For the screen lock toggle (the instruction may be varied a little in different phones) Settings -> Location and security -> Select device administrators -> Unselect “GO Switch Widget” -> Then try the “screen lock” toggle in the widget to lock the screen. Actions: - Wifi, Ringer, Brightness, Bluetooth, MobileNetwork, GPS, Auto-sync, Airplane mode, Auto-rotate, Vibrate, ScreenTimeout, Lock screen, Ringer volume, Media volume - Toggle position modification How to add GOWidgets to your home screen? - Long press on your home screen in GO Launcher EX. Press the GOWidget option and choose the widget you like. Make sure you have enough room for the widget.

description: * An EPIC turn-based RPG with hundreds of Heroes to choose from! * Customize and upgrade your Heroes and build up your party to defeat the Demon King! * Join the saga and play with thousands of players from all across the world! * Over a Million players worldwide [Story] The Kingdom of Atlan was a place of peace and prosperity until a great evil reigned havoc unto the world. The Demon King Beelzebub had emerged, bringing with him pure and unfettered destruction, and leaving only chaos and despair behind him. In one final battle where all hope seemed lost, the Great Sorcerer Magellan and the Guardian Eble had saved the world by sealing away the Demon King! However, after a thousand years of peace, evil still remains and his fury has reawakened! Rise up Hero, and save the Kingdom of Atlan! [Features] • FREE TO PLAY! • Create your own customized party of Heroes with their own unique skills. • Test your abilities by entering weekly tournaments and fight against players from around the world. • Ride and modify spectacular Airships to excavate treasure. • Build life-long partnerships with various pets as they assist you on your adventure. • Hundreds of unique items to upgrade and customize your Heroes. • Invite your friends or make new ones to help you along your journey. • Join or form a guild to partake in intense guild battles and fight massive bosses. • Full support for tablet compatibility. [Note] A stable network connection is required to play. Join our Facebook Community and visit our forums to expand your adventures even further! • Official Game Website: http://heroesofatlan.com • Official Facebook Fanpage: http://facebook.com/HeroesOfAtlan • Official Forums: http://forum.wemadeusa.com/index.php?/forum/4-heroes-of-atlan/ • Terms of Service: http://wemadeusa.com/etc/terms.asp • Privacy Policy: http://wemadeusa.com/etc/privacy.asp *By installing this app, you grant permission to access your phone status, identity and system logs.

description: Mit der App wird Ihre TV TODAY interaktiv. Zusammen mit dem Heft können Sie mit der App Videos ansehen, an Umfragen teilnehmen oder sich an ausgewählte TV-Sendungen erinnern lassen! So einfach geht’s: Im Heft finden Sie an verschiedenen Stellen rote PLAY-Symbole, die Sie auf verfügbare Mehrwerte und Inhalte hinweisen. Starten Sie die App, wählen Sie im Menü die entsprechende Heftausgabe aus und erfassen Sie die ganze Heftseite (nicht nur das rote PLAY-Symbol!) mit der Kamera Ihres Smartphones. Sobald die App die Heftseite erkannt hat erscheinen im Display die verschiedenen, klickbaren Funktions-Buttons für Videos, Votings, Wecker u.v.m. Achtung: Die Inhalte können nur geladen werden, wenn eine Internetverbindung besteht. Tipps: - Achten Sie auf einen möglichst einheitlichen Lichteinfall auf die Heftseiten. - Nutzen Sie – wenn verfügbar – eine WLAN-Verbindung für schnellere Ladezeiten. - Variieren Sie ggf. den Bildausschnitt und den Abstand zwischen Heftseite und Smartphone. Viel Spaß wünscht Ihnen die TV TODAY Redaktion! With the app, your TV is TODAY interactive. Along with the book you can view videos with the app, respond to polls or be reminded of selected TV shows! It's this simple: In the booklet you will find in various places red PLAY symbols to alert you to available content and added value. Start the app, select menu, select the appropriate issue and enter the output entire magazine page (not just the red PLAY button!) With the camera of your smartphone. Once the app has recognized the issue page will appear in the display and much more, the various clickable function buttons for video, voting, alarm clock Note: The contents can be loaded only when an Internet connection. Tips: - Pay attention to a single possible incidence of light on the book pages. - Benefit - if available - a Wi-Fi connection for faster loading times. - Vary the picture and if the distance between page booklet and smartphone. Enjoy!, The TV TODAY editorial!
release_text: Liebe Nutzer der TV TODAY PLAY App, vielen Dank für das zahlreiche Feedback. Diese Version enthält folgende Updates: - neues, schlankeres Design - vielfältigere Inhalte und Funktionen - umfassende Stabilitätsverbesserung - kürzere Ladezeiten und bessere Performance Viel Spaß bei der Nutzung wünscht TV TODAY!

A simple Call Recorder to record all your incoming and outgoing calls Note:- Different phones support different audio source, please try and find which works better for you. usually default Audio Source Mic is supported by most of the phones. Features - Enable/Disable call recording - Records all your phone calls - Play recorded audio by touch on the list - Delete call records - Share call records - Save call records from getting cleaned up - Recording filter to record only incoming, or only outgoing or all - Recording filter for contacts, select contacts to ignore, contacts to record. - option for Delayed start for call recording of an outgoing call, to avoid dail-tone/ring-tone - Add Notes/hint about important part of conversation. - Ability to stop in-progress call recording from setting menu - Shake to start call recording - Select Contacts to Auto Save the call recordings - Calibrate Shake Sensitivity settings. - Option to Search a Call Record. - Change recordings path - Expandable Call Screen Widget - language support - Russian, Chinese (simpified), Spanish, Turkish, French Disclaimer:- Local laws applicable, If the local governing law does not allow call recording, you will be downloading and using this App at your own risk. "Sethi Apps" is in no way liable for any kind of legal or non-legal issues that arise by the use of this App.

The sequel to last year's fantastic Hidden Object game, Mystery Venue! Tamalaki presents: Tour around a mysterious town in Hidden Object Mystery Venue 2! Brace yourself as you enter this secret venue bravely, as our previous explorers say there is no turning back once you get in! Game Features: - Play through 150 exciting levels in ARCADE mode! That is more than 4 hours of fun Hidden Objects search! - More than 10 distinct Game Modes: offering you truly different experience through the game! - Invite everyone to play by creating a new profile for each of them! - More than 15 gorgeous scenes, each featuring mysterious landscapes full of secrets. - Match 3 Minigame: When you want to take a quick break from searching for Hidden Objects, play the exciting Match 3 mini game! - Zoom feature: Help you look at smaller items! - Extras: 6 exciting Game Modes are available under Extras menu when you just want a quick session! This app is ad-supported. If you like to support development for this game, you may choose to upgrade to full version from within the game. Notes: - Some scenes may look a bit darker and harder to find items. It is advised to adjust your device's brightness when this happens. - There are known issues with devices that are overloaded with apps. - Over time, your device's performance may degrade. To ensure maximum performance, try restarting your device prior to playing our game. - If you have problem installing the game, please reach us for help. Our goal is to make you fully happy with our game quality! If you found any problems with our games, please report to us! Please do send us email and we'll respond ASAP. We will respond to every game feedback and fix them as soon as we can!

description: Unblock Totem is a simple and addictive puzzle game.The goal is to get the red block out of the board by sliding the yellow blocks out of the way. 45 well designed levels ranging from Beginner to Expert ! Enjoy!

The ReGular Clock is just that a simple but beautiful clock. The Free Live Wallpaper clock (LWP) displays the time and date (year, month, day) and the current moon-phase in an interesting design. For more settings like: (Widget like) Screen Placement, Text Size (or no text), Clock Size, Background Color, more monochrome Clock Colors, Date/no Date and more options please upgrade to the PRO Regular Clock. The ReGular Clock shows off your phone and looks great on tablets.Tested on Samsung Galaxy Nexus, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Samsung Galaxy Note II (Note 2), Samsung Galaxy Note 3 (Note III), Samsung Galaxy SII (S2), Samsung Galaxy S3 (III), Samsung Galaxy S4, LG Optimus, LG G2 (South Korea), Toshiba, Sony Tablet S, Sony Tablet P, Sony Xperia Z, Sony Xperia Z1 (Japan), Asus Eee Pad Transformer, Asus nexus 7, Acer Iconia, HTC Flyer, HTC X, HTC One (Taiwan), Lenovo Idea Pad (China), Motorola Moto X, Motorola Droid RAZR, Motorola Droid X (USA). This and all other ARTware apps run well on Google's Nexus 7 and 10 tablet and the Google Nexus 4 and Nexus 5 phone. The ReGular Clock is small program that runs well on Android 2.1+ devices with Live Wallpaper including Ice Cream Sandwich (ICS), Jelly Bean, KitKat and hopefully soon Lollipop. For "first time" Live Wallpaper users (after download): Please go to Wallpapers -> Live Wallpaper -> ReGular Clock Please email us if you have any problems or suggestions. Enjoy and watch the Time, Date and Moonphase! from ARTware+Software (Swiss+made modern minimal analog/digital apps without advertising)
release_text: 2.30 Corrections for Moon phase calculations 2.30 Adjusted Moon phase calculation for the new year. 2.25 Expanded color selections 2.20 Added new options for multicolor or monochrome Clock faces 2.15 Fixed problems with moon-phase calculation 2.10 Improved Text size for phones and tablets with high resolution screens. Adjusted moon-phase calculation and added links to other ARTware apps on the PLAY Store.

description: 3D Game Changer is compatible with LG SMART TV for Android (former LG Google TV). With this application you can use your Android smartphone as a game controller to enhanced gaming experience as well as to control basic functionality of your TV. [How to Connect] 1. Make sure that the TV and your Android phone is connected to the same Network. 2. Launch the Game remote application and select your TV with the right IP address. [Features] ** Game Feature ** - Touch: You can control the game via touch-screen and you can also mirror the TV screen to the mobile phone. In the touch mode go to ‘menu’ and select the ‘receive the TV screen’ - Gamepad: Use this mode if the game needs to full gamepad ** TV Feature ** - Remote Controller: Control the basic functions such as volume and channel with this app. - Touch: Since the LG Android TV has the Magic Remote you can also use the touch to control the TV with the mouse pointer. - Smart Home: Mirrors the ‘All apps’ menu and makes it easy to browse and select the app you want

CameraCast puts pictures you take with your camera on your TV. After you connect to your Chromecast, each time you tap the screen, the current image will be sent to your TV. Connect more than one device to the Chromecast to see pictures from all devices at once. Not only can you see all images on the Chromecast, but you can see the most recent images from all other connected devices on your own device (this is off by default; turn it on in the settings). CameraCast is ad-supported. Purchase the unlocker to get these additional features: ● No ads! ● Auto-shutter: automatically send a new image to the Chromecast every second, every five seconds, etc. CameraCast can be used for all kinds of things: ● Use it as an image projector at home or in the classroom! ● Use auto-shutter mode to watch a certain area, like the nursery at nap time or the front door for a delivery! The camera uses quite a bit of power, so if you are using auto-shutter mode, you will likely want to connect your device to a charger. Please email me with any questions/comments/suggestions or to report a bug. hillmanapps@gmail.com
release_text: v1.2.1 - Fix for crash when switching to the front-facing camera. v1.2.0 - Ask, and ye shall receive. Added the ability to save CameraCast photos for use later. Check "Store Photos" in the Camera settings, and all photos taken with CameraCast will be saved in the CameraCast directory on the SD card. Enjoy!

description: Qello Concerts turns any screen into a live concert experience. Watch the world's largest collection of full-length concerts and music documentaries on demand! Stream Queen, Pink Floyd, Bruce Springsteen, The Doors, Lady Gaga, Metallica, Nirvana, Tiesto, Tupac, Slipknot, Paul McCartney, Beyonce, Bob Marley, Linkin Park, Tupac, Santana, Bon Jovi, Imagine Dragons, Gary Clark Jr, and countless other performances from your favorite artists – on any device. The free app download provides: * One or more free tracks from every show. * More than 30 channels of continuous concert moments on Qello TV. * Free shows each week with the Free Music Friday program. An All-Access Pass is only $4.99 US each month and gets you: * Unlimited Access to watch all shows in the collection, any time! * Performances from new and iconic artists spanning every genre. * Incredible award-winning music documentaries. * New shows added weekly. * Create your own Setlists of live concert video moments * Enjoy Qello Concerts curated Setlists and Collections * 30+ channels of continuous concert programming with Qello TV. Qello in the news: * USA Today: "A haven for music movies." * Billboard: "A Super-Hip Netflix for Concert Films." * Fuse: "#1 must-download music app." * Maxim: "One of the most captivating apps we've seen in any app store." * Questlove: "I discovered musician's heaven. This channel is a gold mine!" Start your 7-DAY FREE TRIAL! Cancel Anytime. After your free trial ends, your Qello All-Access Pass subscription will automatically renew at $4.99 US each month. It's risk-free because you can cancel at any time. Enjoy the show! Special App Permissions: - ‘getLine1Number’ with READ_PHONE_STATE is used only to retrieve your telephone number if you choose to purchase an All-Access Pass with your AT&T account. Your phone number is not stored by Qello.

Enjoy this version of the classic snake game. As a goal, you will have to guide the snake to eat as many rats as possible. During the game some special bonuses will appear. Try to catch them. This bonuses will give you some special skills.

From the creators of the very popular Greek games, Eureka and Become rich, another general knowledge quiz game. Το παιχνίδι των Γνώσεων - Κουίζ Γνώσεων στα Ελληνικά. Από τους δημιουργούς των αγαπημένων σας παιχνιδιών, Εκατομμυριούχος, Εύρηκα, Κρεμάλα και τα Σταυρόλεξα, ήρθε το νέο μας εκπαιδευτικό και διασκεδαστικό παιχνίδι! Είναι το απόλυτο παιχνίδι γνώσεων (trivia game) γιατί περιλαμβάνει πάνω από 3.500 ερωτήσεις που έχουν δημιουργηθεί από την ομάδα των συνεργαζόμενων με την εταιρεία μας εκπαιδευτικών. Ο τρόπος παιχνιδιού είναι πολύ απλός: Διαλέγετε μια κατηγορία ερωτήσεων στην οποία θέλετε να παίξετε ή όλες τις κατηγορίες μαζί. Προσπαθήστε να απαντήσετε σωστά σε όσες περισσότερες ερωτήσεις μπορείτε ώστε να συγκεντρώσετε περισσότερους πόντους. Μπορείτε να κάνετε ως τρία λάθη χωρίς να χάσετε αφού έχετε τρεις ζωές στη διάθεσή σας. Εάν απαντήσετε σωστά σε 5 ερωτήσεις στη σειρά κερδίζετε μία επιπλέον ζωή. Δεν μπορείτε όμως να έχετε πάνω από τρεις ζωές στη διάθεσή σας. Το παιχνίδι προσφέρει: ✓ Πάνω από 3500 ερωτήσεις πολλαπλής επιλογής κατάλληλα επιλεγμένες για τον διασκεδαστικό αλλά και επιμορφωτικό τους χαρακτήρα. ✓ 10 κατηγορίες ερωτήσεων ✓ Καταγραφή των υψηλότερων σκορ ✓ Online Score ✓ Όμορφα γραφικά ✓ Πολύ μικρό μέγεθος, μόλις 2,5Mb ✓ Υποστηρίζει όλα τα κινητά και tablet PCs με λειτουργικό σύστημα android. ✓ Είναι σχεδιασμένο σε συνεργασία με πολύ έμπειρους εκπαιδευτικούς ✓ Απολύτως δωρεάν Καλή διασκέδαση!

[ Taiwan Resorts ] contains a list of more than 1400 resorts information all around Taiwan. A set of search functions are provided with in the app, such as, sorting by resorts name/address/tel , searching all columns by keyword and browsing through Taiwan counties and districts. While viewing any individual resort item, there are some simple and helpful functions to access information : 1. Making phone call to the number listed. 2. Redirect to map application with address listed. 3. Open Safari with website url listed. 4. Sending infomation of selected item through E-mail. 5. Each item can be saved to a favorite folder for later access. 6. Built in memo function allows you to add memo info to any resorts item. 7. While viewing specific item, long press (2 sec) on any item info property will trigger internet search for specific item info. 8. Using Internet search engine to search for images of any resort item. (Using finger swipe to jump through internet image search result on Cell Phone and use two finger pinch/zoom on single image)

With Housing, you can post a flat for sale, find an apartment to rent, buy a new property, discover a house to purchase, select a PG/hostel, find the right tenant, and look up new localities. Looking for a home? Welcome to property search made easy. Here are a few cool things we have in our App to help you find the perfect place to live: - Beyond Verified: We take all photos and collect dozens of data points on each property. -Lots of Details: We love data, and so every property listing is filled with data we collect. -Search for What You Want: Sort and Filter the properties based on amenities! Narrow it down by specifics, such as sofas, TVs, AC, pools, parking, gas. -List Properties with a Click: Landlords, owners, agents: Have the Housing team do everything: We’ll come to you to snap photos, gather information, and post the listing. -More Listings, Daily: Our dedicated Housing team adds properties daily -Stay in the Know: Receive personalised Alerts when new postings are added. -Contact Owners, Landlords, and Agents Directly: Reach out directly using our app. -Shortlist Flats: Save your favourites, across devices. -Share Homes you Love: Look up houses and share listings. -Accessible from Any Device: Access your shortlist and personalised alerts from any device. -A Free App, with No Ads: Everything is posted by us. Always. -Lifestyle Rating: Wondering how the neighborhood fares? Our Data Science Lab aggregates lots of data to provide you with locality ratings. -Many Cities: Find a home in Mumbai, Bangalore, Delhi, Pune, and many more! Look up and Live Better, with Housing.
release_text: Lots of behind the scenes changes in this app, including some fixes on notifications, alerts, and search results. We also have some juicy changes based on feedback. Thanks to everyone for the feedback! We're listening. Keep the ideas and comments coming by emailing support@housing.com. #lookup #together #livebetter

description: Pad up and partner up! From the creators of the most popular cricket game in the world, Stick Cricket Partnerships offers you the chance to: BAT WITH YOUR FRIENDS Head out into the middle with your mates, working together to complete each level. Whether chasing a big target, smashing sixes or surviving against spin, teamwork is essential. BAT WITH THE ALL STARS Partner with some of the greats of the game. Choose carefully: a stand with a Slogger may end prematurely, while batting alongside an Accumulator may send you - and the crowd - to sleep. REVIEW UMPIRING DECISIONS Extend your stay at the crease with the help of the DRS (Dodgy Review System). EARN REWARDS Pocket cash bonuses to spend on upgrading your bat, unlocking more All Star Partners or stocking up on Dodgy Referrals. --- Easy to play yet hard to master, Stick Cricket Partnerships boasts the same “hellishly addictive” (Gizmodo) gameplay that helped Stick Cricket to become a productivity-destroying phenomenon worldwide. Whether batting with a friend (Facebook or Stick Sports account required) or forging a one-day stand with a random, Partnerships is the ultimate test of teamwork. By downloading this app you are accepting our EULA: http://www.sticksports.com/mobile/terms.php Important message: This game includes in-app purchases.
release_text: BUG FIXES: We’ve oiled Sticky’s bat and fixed a few issues.

*The Game* Mages arrive! Apprentices from the famed Temple  have graduated and will now aid players with their amazing abilities! From the makers of your favourite Magic Temple game, here comes the highly anticipated sequel- Magic Temple 2 : Mage Wars! Magic Temple lies in the fantastic world of the ancient elements - Earth, Fire and Ice. Only by mastering them all can you be called a true mage worthy of being a Guardian in the Magic Temple Hall of Fame. As a young mage, your objective is to Tap & Match gems to increase the power of that particular element and finally unlock their magical essence. You have 60 seconds to show the world your magic! To help you in your quest, you can arm yourself with special boosters to enhance your spells and powers. Each game is a mad rush of wits and reflexes. Act fast and keep your combos up — or risk being over shadowed by more powerful mages. Features------------◦ Simple and addictive gameplay◦ Absolutely no age barrier to be a magician◦ Extremely fast-paced and highly competitive◦ Easy to pick up but has enough challenges to engage even advanced players ◦ Provides short and quick sessions for those times you just need something to do◦ Speed, gameplay, graphics and sound come together to provide a satisfying experience◦ Leader boards to pit you against the world — or your friends! 60 seconds to beat your friends and compete with the best across the globe. Are you Ready? Like us on Facebook for the latest news:www.facebook.com/magictemple2
release_text: Updates to your favorite Magic Temple II: 1. Added hints and suggestions for scoring more 2. Improved friend bonuses and challenges 3. Faster loading time

description: Продолжение популярной серии «Полиглот» поможет вам познать тайну употребления артиклей в английском языке. Уникальная методика обучения в легкой игровой форме научит вас: • когда следует употреблять неопределенный артикль «a» • когда уместнее использовать определенный артикль «the» • когда лучше обойтись без артикля Английский язык — это не сложно. Занимайтесь всего по 10 - 15 минут в день. Когда угодно и где угодно! СПИСОК ЗАНЯТИЙ • A и THE, противопоставление • THE и нулевой артикль • A и нулевой артикль • Имена собственные КАК ЭТО РАБОТАЕТ Программа предлагает вам простые выражения на русском языке. Из слов на экране вам нужно составить английский перевод. Если вы ответили правильно, программа похвалит вас. Если вдруг ошиблись - подскажет правильный ответ. По мере составления ответа, выбранные слова озвучиваются. Затем озвучивается правильный ответ. Чтобы перейти к следующему уроку необходимо набрать 4.5 балла в предыдущем уроке. Пока баллы не набраны, уроки остаются заблокированными. Как рассчитываются баллы? Программа помнит 100 последних ответов, количество ПРАВИЛЬНЫХ ответов делит на 100 и умножает на 5. Чтобы набрать 4.5 балла, надо ответить правильно на 90 вопросов из 100. Приложение не содержит встроенных покупок и рекламы. Приложение оптимизировано для планшетов и телефонов с большим экраном. ПРИМЕЧАНИЕ Если вы только начинаете изучать английский язык, советуем вам сначала познакомиться с основами английской грамматики. В этом вам поможет наше приложение «Полиглот. Базовый курс» https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.axidep.polyglotfull Наша группа ВКонтакте: http://vk.com/polyglotmobile Continuation of the popular series "Polyglot" will help you learn the secret of the use of articles in English. The unique technique of training in the playful form will teach you: • when to use the indefinite article «a» • when it is appropriate to use the definite article «the» • when it is better to do without the article English - it's not difficult. Takes only 10 - 15 minutes a day. Anytime and anywhere! LIST OF CLASSES • A and THE, opposition • THE and zero article • A and zero article • Proper names HOW IT WORKS The program offers simple expressions in Russian. Of the words on the screen you need to make an English translation. If you answer correctly, the program will praise you. If you suddenly make a mistake - tell the correct answer. As you compose your reply, selected words are sounded. Then voiced the correct answer. To go to the next lesson you need to dial 4.5 points in the previous lesson. While no points are recruited, the lessons remain locked. How are the points? The program remembers the last 100 responses, number of correct answers divide by 100 and multiply by 5. To score 4.5 points, you must answer correctly 90 questions out of 100. Application does not contain built-in shopping and advertising. The application is optimized for tablets and phones with a large screen. NOTE If you are just starting to learn English, we suggest that you first learn the basics of English grammar. This will help our application "Polyglot. Basic Course " https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.axidep.polyglotfull Our group VKontakte: http://vk.com/polyglotmobile
