OVERVIEW: Visual Bones is an interactive reference, and education tool. It not only covers bones from all the main regions of the body but also includes internal skull bones, laryngeal skeleton, ear bones, hand bones and foot bones. In additional, it includes several ligaments in the shoulder region, ankle and knee region and 6 types of synovial joints. Over 100 bone markers are added. The app contains over 200 high-resolution images including 13 single bone images (major bones) from Gray’s Anatomy and more than 300 feature points which can be interactively selected. All region bone images were generated from the 3D rendering of the 3D virtual human skeleton. Once a feature point is selected, a bone or region is highlighted and it can be viewed in the anterior, posterior or lateral view. Each feature has its own label and short description. The app also has 3D rotational models for the skull, internal skull, rib, shoulder, pelvis, and knee. The app also has search function which can be used as searching the labels of all feature points. In additional, over 300 position quizzes and 3 quizzes with 76 multi-choice questions also are included. USES: This app’s primary use is as a learning tool but can also be used for any professional who needs the occasional reminder. Additionally, this app is ideal for physicians, educators or professionals, allowing them to visually show detailed areas to their patients or students - helping to educate or explain conditions, ailments and injuries. FEATURES: ★ No internet connection is required. ★ Tap and Zoom - zoom into and identify any region, bone or other feature by tapping on the screen. ★ Quiz mode – can be used as the flash card as it displays the highlighted region with no label. ★ Quick Navigation - jump to a different region by selecting the thumbnail. ★ Multi-choice quiz. ★ Great for learning anatomy and physiology ★ High-resolution images. ★ Free periodic updates. CONTENTS: Skull, Skull internal, Nasal Cartilages, Spine Column, Rib Cage, Arm Bones, Hand Bones, Ear Bones, Pelvis, Knee, Ankle, Foot Bones, Synovial Joints. HOW TO USE: The user is presented with a high-quality 3D bone images. The user can zoom in to any area by tapping on the zoom in button and using the single finger panning function. The feature point (cross) can be selected by tapping on it and bone or region is highlighted. Detail button allows you to switch on/off the short description. Quiz mode button allows you to switch on/off the label and short description. The rotation icons on the top of screen can be pressed to change the view of bones.
release_text: 1.Improve UI 2. Add French, German, Spanish language support.

description: Description: Widget--Full radar on your home screen, with zoom in and out. Check it out! Displays real-time local and national weather radar directly from the National Weather Service on Google Maps in an easy to use program. Zoom in/out, loop weather radar images, current storm warnings, satellite images, total precipitation, current location forecast from the National Weather Service including current watches and warnings, and much more! Full options menu allows you to change tons of settings and customize your experience. Android Tablet Ready!!! Works great on both older Tablets (Android 2.2+) all the way up to Lollipop Tablets!!! All new Forecast page with tons of features! Check it out. ****All issues left in the comments have been fixed--if you find any new bugs, email them to support@gudensoft.com ***** -National Weather Map coverage!!! -More Google Map Types -More weather radar products: 3 Weather Radar Products with/without loop all from the National Weather Service Visible Satellite Infrared Water Vapor 1 hour precipitation 24/48/72 hour precipitation Warning polygons -TIMESTAMPS!!!! -Better user interface -pinch to zoom (Android 3.0 and up) -sliding options menu -Better performance -GPS is now optional -Works great on Tablets! -Runs great installed on SDCard--set to prefer SDCard Extended return policy: We are not a fan of the new 15 minute refund policy set by Google. 15 minutes is not enough time to get a feel for all the features in this program so our policy is as follows: We want you to like and use this application. If for any reason you are not satisfied with this application within 5 days of purchase, please email us at support@gudensoft.com with your name, and date of purchase and we will issue a full refund to you. All we ask in return is to let us know what features you would like to see in this program in order for you to repurchase the application. For more information about NWS Weather Radar, or any of our releases, please see http://www.gudensoft.com ---If you are having issues, please contact me at support@gudensoft.com and provide the issue, type of phone, and version of Android. We don't like seeing errors, and we know you don't either! NOTE FROM DEVELOPER: Due to the NWS servers downtime, we have switched data providers on the BASE Radar images. If you are having issues seeing any radar data, go into settings, and switch from High Res to Base, scroll down and click SAVE. If anyone would like a refund due to the outages, please email support@gudensoft.com with your name, and date of purchase and we will honor your request regardless of when it was purchased. THANK YOU!
release_text: Be sure to scroll down to read our expanded 5 day return policy! 15 minutes is not enough time to try out this app! DAVdroid is the only all-in-one synchronization solution for both contacts (CardDAV) and calendars (CalDAV). The app is easy to set up and integrates perfectly with your favorite calendar/contacts app (including default apps). It can also be used seperately, if you either have CalDAV or CardDAV. Compatible with most CalDAV/CardDAV servers and services, including OwnCloud, iCloud and OS X Server! After installing, you can add a DAVdroid account from within the app. See http://davdroid.bitfire.at/configuration for help. Key features: ⊛ Use DAV calendars (CalDAV) and address-books (CardDAV) in a single app ⊛ Two-way synchronization (server ↔ client) ⊛ Native Android 4+ implementation ⊛ Flawless integration with your device and favorite apps ⊛ Easy setup (resource auto-detection) ⊛ Fast algorithms for high performance (CTag/ETag support) ⊛ Optimized for phones and tablets ⊛ DAVdroid JB Workaround verfügbar ⊛ ... and finally – it's open source! Important compatibility notes For all Android 4.1 and all Samsung users: There's an Android bug that causes accounts to be lost after a device reboot. To avoid this issue, please install the free app "DAVdroid JB Workaround". Samsung users: The problem doesn't occur if you download DAVdroid using Samsung Store. On some Android 4.4.2 devices , DAVdroid accounts will disappear after an app update. If you experience this issue, please install the free app "DAVdroid JB Workaround". Details: http://davdroid.bitfire.at/faq/entry/account-gone-after-updating Galaxy S5 users: There are numerous reports that the Samsung Galaxy S5 (only affects Samsung original firmware) contact editor crashes when using it with third-party contacts providers (like DAVdroid or similar apps). Details and workarounds: http://davdroid.bitfire.at/faq/entry/galaxy-s5-contact-app-crashes There are issues with some HTC firmwares and contact synchronisation: http://davdroid.bitfire.at/faq/entry/htc-contact-problems DAVdroid must not be moved to the SD card! This will cause strange behaviour, including account and data loss. If you're using self-signed certificates, you might find our free and open-source app CAdroid useful to import your certificate. Get the best out of this app … ⊛ … when using with your own DAV server (Radicale, DAViCal, SabreDAV, Baikal, …) and HTTPS – so you own and control all your data while having the comfort of synchronization between various devices. Or use a hosted DAV service you trust or the one of your company. ⊛ … and combine it with Evolution / Lightning / etc. on your laptop / PC Why is it secure? ⊛ Source code is available (see homepage) ⊛ No need for giving your contacts/calendars to Facebook, Google, etc. Use your own server (or a trusted one)! ⊛ SSL is recommended to protected your communication so synchronization is secure even when using open Wi-Fi networks. Successfully tested with: ⊛ AOL ⊛ Apple's Calendar and Contacts Server ⊛ Apple iCloud ⊛ Baïkal ⊛ contactzilla ⊛ CozyCloud ⊛ DAViCal ⊛ eGroupware ⊛ fastmail ⊛ fruux ⊛ gmx ⊛ Horde ⊛ Mac OS X Server ⊛ mailbox.org ⊛ mail.de ⊛ Kerio Connect ⊛ KolabNow ⊛ OwnCloud ⊛ posteo.de ⊛ Radicale ⊛ SOGo ⊛ Synology DSM ⊛ web.de ⊛ Yahoo (calendars only) ⊛ Yandex ⊛ Zimbra Server (Community Edition)
release_text: * address books and calendars are now detected when the home-set is the same as the collection * updated Hungarian, Serbian, Spanish translations (thanks to @gjtoth, @pejakm, @xphnx) * improved VEVENT time zone guessing (thanks to @Spriguin) * ignore illegal SIP addresses * generate VCard/3 N property for contacts with only prefix/suffix

description: This is the best Korean Soft Keyboard ever!! With this app and two Android smartphones you can build up a full FPV system with your rc model. The video of one smartphone is transfered via Wi-Fi direct to the other and also the control information back to control the rc model with a gamepad and a small arduino setup. description: Hourly updated pictures and news of Digital Art. Features: - Picture and news updates - FullScreen pictures - Pictures available Offline - Pictures and Digital Art news Like Digital art is a general term for a range of artistic works and practices that use digital technology as an essential part of the creative and/or presentation process. Since the 1970s, various names have been used to describe the process including computer art and multimedia art, and digital art is itself placed under the larger umbrella term new media art. After some initial resistance, the impact of digital technology has transformed activities such as painting, drawing, sculpture and music/sound art, while new forms, such as net art, digital installation art, and virtual reality, have become recognized artistic practices. More generally the term digital artist is used to describe an artist who makes use of digital technologies in the production of art. In an expanded sense, "digital art" is a term applied to contemporary art that uses the methods of mass production or digital media.

description: The No.1 Landlord Online - Everyone's Favorite Landlord Game ♠ Play as guest, no registration required ♠ Rated 5 stars by our players ♠ Over 20 million players worldwide, join tables in no time ♠ Play free: Get as much as 1500 chips to start out with = Features = ♥ Authentic Landlord gameplay ♥ Over 20 million players - tap twice and you're in ♥ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ♥ Bigger and clearer graphics ♥ Loads of achievements and prizes ♥ Never go bankrupt: always get more chips so you can continue to play! = What’s New = ♥ Landlord tournaments (Realtor, Tycoon, Magnate) ♥ Various new modes give you an awesome gaming experience = Rules = ♣ Classic gameplay: 1. Landlord is played with 3 players and one 52-card deck plus 2 jokers. 2. All but 3 cards are distributed among the 3 players. For the remaining 3 cards an auction is held to determine which player will be the landlord. 3. The possible bids during the auction are 1, 2 and 3. Players may bid higher than the current bid or pass. Whoever bids highest becomes the landlord, takes the 3 remaining cards, and will play alone against the other two. 4. If all 3 players pass, the cards will be reshuffled and the game restarted. 5. The landlord takes the 3 remaining cards and will play alone against the other two. The landlord plays first. 6. Players play anticlockwise. Each player must try to beat the currently played cards or select to pass. 7. Any player can choose to pass any time, but he must pass if he can't beat the previous play. 8. Whichever side (landlord or one of the two remaining players) runs out of cards first wins! ♣ “Rob the Landlord”: 1. After one player has called to be landlord, each other player has a one-time chance to rob the title from him. 2. If a player chooses to rob the title, that player will be landlord for that game. If no player chooses to rob the title, the landlord will stay the same. 3. Once chosen, players are not allowed to change their selection whether to rob the title or not. For full game rules please visit： http://www.godgame.com.tw/landlord/?op=teach = Additional Notes = ♦ You can use your existing GodGame, Facebook, or Yahoo account to play immediately ♦ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for details: http://www.gamesofa.com/sevensapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa - Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? Gamesofa Website: http://www.gamesofa.com More Games: http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/ The No.1 Landlord Online - Everyone's Favorite Landlord Game! Play as guest, no registration required! Over 20 million players worldwide, join tables in no time!

description: Boiling OSSAN Eggs is back with a special summer edition! We've released a new edition based on the popular app with now over 2 million downloads! It's a mini edition, but please enjoy all of the new content we have in store! Get ready for the most fun and exhilarating entry in the OSSAN series yet! This time around, experience new boiling pots such as the scary "KAIDAN", or see the pretty fireworks go up in "MATSURI"! Also, making a special appearance is the "WATERMELON" boiling pot!? From super hot to really cool, new OSSAN overflowing with personality make their appearance one after another in the sweltering summer heat! But wait, there's more! If you peel rotten eggs, rotten OSSAN will appear! (Once you collect a URA NABE pot!) Also of course, there are new summer-style Niwatori costumes and wallpaper for you to collect! Feel all the great things that summer has to offer! Also, please enjoy this new special edition of OSSAN! -------------------- Boil an egg to get an OSSAN! Enjoy making OSSAN filled with personality! This time though, surprising special guests may appear! 3-Easy-Steps! 1. Boil the egg 2. Peel off the egg shell 3. There! You have your boiled OSSAN egg! Same as before, everyone can enjoy this! USE some fine salt(ARAJIO): Purchase ARAJIO at the store. Using ARAJIO will boil the eggs faster, and prevent fast rotting eggs! Remember to always use ARAJIO! Collect all the OSSAN: When you collect many different kinds of boiled OSSAN eggs, you can get a new boiling pot! You can create even more different kinds of boiled OSSAN eggs with your newly obtained pot! Enjoy the non-stop growth of the OSSAN collection! Rotten egg peeling is also supported!: Once you get a "URA NABE" pot, you add rotten OSSAN to your collection! Look forward to collecting the URA OSSAN! You can receive the first URA NABE by simply collecting regular OSSAN. As for the second onward, you can buy them from the in-game store! New Feature: Half-boiled OSSAN! After it finishes boiling, if you can collect an egg within one minute, it will become a Half-boiled OSSAN! They can be sold at a higher price than normal! Updated wallpaper and costumes! More popular wallpaper and Niwatori costumes have been added! Please enjoy these new things we've made! And so, what exactly is a boiled OSSAN egg? This app demonstrates the irony of the modern day world, by showing a little egg (a baby) being thrown into the hot boiling water (the society), results in each unique boiled OSSAN egg. -------------------- Like us! https://www.facebook.com/ossantamago Follow us! https://twitter.com/ossantamago -------------------- Popular OSSAN stamps are currently available on LINE! For LINE users, why don't you give them a try? http://line.me/S/sticker/1001453 -------------------- Check out our Music Video! MUSIC VIDEO - OSSAN TANGO http://youtu.be/lC-TU7YES1c TRAILER http://youtu.be/XYoBiumDm3c ------------------------------------ If you haven't played the OSSAN series yet, feel free to give these apps a try! - Boiling OSSAN Eggs! - Ossan Train Stuffing! - OSSAN Eggs Camera! - OSSAN Eggs! mini -Winter Ver.- - OSSAN Eggs! mini -Spring Ver.- Have fun with the OSSAN series!

Easypay app is an innovative service of Piraeus Bank that helps you make bill payments wherever you are, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. EVERYONE CAN USE easypay app You don’t need to be a Piraeus Bank customer. You only have to - use a MasterCard or Visa card (debit, credit or prepaid) issued by any bank (Greek or non-Greek) and - either · already be a registered user of easypay.gr service or, · subscribe to easypay through the app, following a fully on-line procedure that lasts less than a minute. YOU MAY PAY YOUR BILLS AND OBLIGATIONS The following bill payments are currently available: - Cosmote mobile phone bills (*) - Forthnet phone bills - Hellas On Line phone bills - Multichoice / Nova cable TV subscriptions - Vodafone mobile phone bills - Wind mobile phone bills - Verified Tax Obligations(*) - DEI (Public Power Company) utility bills(*) - EYDAP water and sewage bills(*) - OTE phone bills(*) - Vehicle Tax Fees(*) You may also load your e-pass device for Attiki Odos. IT IS EASY TO USE You may pay your bills by: - scanning the barcode on the billing statement – if provided by the organization, - or simply filling in the necessary fields required and are displayed on the billing statement. By using the “Scan the card” feature you may scan your card’s details instead of typing them and you may also save them – assigning an alias name – for future use. IT IS SAFE All the above mentioned are supported by Piraeus Bank, following very demanding security standards. HELP IS ALWAYS AVAILABLE For additional information or support, you may contact Piraeus Bank customer support at +30 210 3288000 or email us at support@easypay.gr . (*) Available only for cards issued by Piraeus Bank

Droid Commander Free is a simple two pane manager when your device is in landscape mode, and a simple to use, single pane file manager when your device is in portrait mode. It has a built-in text viewer/editor which can handle small text files (<5 MB), but you can open any file with any installed application. Features: - Basic file management functions: copy, cut, paste, move, delete, rename files stored on your SD card - Select multiple files - Edit text files - Transfer files via Bluetooth - Physical keyboard support. This is a free version, supported by ads, so it will require INTERNET access to retrieve ads and it will use LOCATION services to display ads relevant to your location. Also, being a file manager, it does require access to the sdcard (WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE). All the icons in this application are extracted from Oxygen Icon Theme without any modification Oxygen Homepage: http://www.oxygen-icons.org Oxygen Licence: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.txt These icons may be freely copied by anyone under LGPLv3.

Provide instant alert for Hong Kong's motorist when detected speed camera ahead. Alert will be triggered while speed camera ahead approximately 1-3km far, user has sufficient time to slow down their speed to avoid summons. Features: ► Speed Camera Alert is not determine on camera location by radius to trigger alert like other apps does. Due to driving safety concern, alert will not simply trigger when you’re not in risk but within the radius, Speed Camera Alert is smart enough only alert when the camera is in front of your driving direction. ► It is designed to work at background even phone went into sleep mode, and also allow user to use other apps at the same time. ► It will turn on screen when alert trigger and going back to sleep mode after pass by camera spot. This can save battery consumption significantly during traveling. ► Internet or data connection is NOT required but only required when you switch to Map view (to download map data). ► ONLY GPS is required to turn on in order to get precise camera and user coordinates. ► Human voice alerting. ► Camera location in Map view.

description: Cet ouvrage est le fruit d'un travail considérable, réalisé pendant de longues années par un équipe nombreuse de spécialistes dans toutes disciplines médicales. Écrit par des médecins pour le grand public, il tend à satisfaire la curiosité légitime de chacun pour toute ce qui touche à la santé. Le lecteur trouvera dans cet ouvrage tout ce qu'il souhaite connaître sur la structure et le fonctionnement de l'organisme en général et de chaque organe en particulier, sur les causes, les symptômes et les traitements des maladies, affections et traumatismes qui perturbent la santé du corps ou de l'esprit, pour le sens précis de nombreux mots savants employé par les médecins. Malgré tout le soin apporté à la réalisation de cet ouvrage et en raison des domaines vastes et complexes qui y sont abordés, une erreur aura pu s'y glisser. Nous ne saurions être tenus pour responsables de ses Co. Seans ces, ni de celles d'une interprétation erronées, soulignons-le, ce ouvrage ne peut remplacer l'avis médical. Le but du dictionnaire médical aspire à devenir le compagnon fidèle, le guide de tous ceux qui ont besoin de comprendre les quelque 10 000 termes qui forment le langage médical courant: le grand public, car jamais la communication n'a été plus difficiile, les jargons tecniiques se multipliant et se complicant. Collaborateurs Docteur JP Allard, docteur J Dumont, docteur C Devroye, docteur C Chevalier, docteur PS Marssignac, docteur G Toux, docteur JP Schadé, docteur P Sylvester, docteur A Tibi Copyright MedicaPress AG 2012 This book is the result of considerable work done over many years by a large team of specialists in all medical disciplines. Written by doctors for the general public, it tends to satisfy the legitimate curiosity of everyone for all matters related to health. The reader will find in this book what he wants to know about the structure and functioning of the body in general and of each organ in particular, the causes, symptoms and treatment of diseases, disorders and injuries that disrupt health of body or mind, for the precise meaning of many scientists employed by the doctors words. Despite the care taken in the production of this book and because of the vast and complex areas are addressed, an error will have crept. We can not be held responsible for its Seans these Co. or those of a wrong interpretation, emphasize, this book can not replace medical advice. The purpose of the dictionary aspires to become a faithful companion, guide all those who need to understand about 10,000 words that make up the current medical language: the general public, because communication has never been more difficiile the tecniiques jargons multiplying and complicant. Collaborators Dr. JP Allard, Dr. J Dumont, Dr C Devroye, Dr C Knight, PS Marssignac doctor, Dr. G Cough, Dr. JP Schadé Doctor P Sylvester, Dr. Tibi A Copyright 2012 AG MedicaPress

Mixed Chinese keyboard (混合中文鍵盤) is an implementation of soft keyboard for the Google Android mobile operation system. It provides an interface for the entering of traditional and simplified Chinese characters on Android devices, by means of the Hong Kong Government Cantonese Romanisation convention (香港政府粵語拼音), Cangjie (倉頡), Simplified Cangjie (簡易/速成) and English-Chinese dictionary look up. * Mixed input method, no switching required * HK chars * 16 keyboard layouts * Selection history * Learning related words * Associated phrases * Eng suggestion with correction * Hard keys support * Integrated Eng-Chi dictionary lookup * Phrase lookup * No insecure permission required Phrase lookup (48MB of heap memory is required): Input Chinese phrase directly by the following patterns; * First code of the 1st char. + First code of the 2nd char. + … + First code of the last char., or * First code of the 1st char. + First code of the 2nd char. + … + Full code of the last char. E.g. For '你好嗎' * In Cantonese; key in ‘nhm’ or ‘nhma’. * In Simplified Cangjie; key in ‘ovr’ or ‘ovrf’. * In Cangjie; key in ‘ovr’ or ‘ovrsqf’. Open by: For Android 1.5 ~ 2.3.x; 1.Check the keyboard at Settings > Locale & text 2.Long press a text box > select input method For Android 3.x ~ 4.4.x; 1.Check the keyboard at Settings > Language & input 2.Click a text box > drop down the notification bar and click 'Choose input method' > select input method Visit Web for details. Tips: 1. If you experience extreme lag after updating, try uninstalling and re-installing the keyboard again. 2. After changing theme, try to restart the keyboard or rotate the device with the keyboard active, to make the new theme effective. 3. If you experience touch difficulty, try to set the 'Touch sensitivity' settings as High and Neutral. 4. If you experience missing candidates, try enabling the 'Rarely used characters' option of 'Chinese candidates' setting. 5. Simplified Chinese candidates are disabled by default. Enable it at the 'Character type' option of 'Chinese candidates' setting if required. Known issues: 1. Keyboard closes itself on Contact's phone number text box of Samsung devices with Android 4.x. Will fix once we get a Samsung device on hand to check. 2. Keyboard plays sound on press on LG devices, even sound is disabled in settings. Will fix once we get a LG device on hand to check.
release_text: Ver 0.5.2: 1. Improve touch sensitivity of the candidates selection bar. Ver 0.5.1: 1. New option for auto removing space between English and Chinese word. 2. New option for auto inserting space between Chinese and English word. 3. Fix the jumping candidate selection bar for tablets. 4. Minor bug fixes. Ver 0.5.0: 1. Phrase lookup. 2. Better Associated phrases suggestion. 3. English auto completion with correction. 4. Various bug fixes.

description: The French dictionary explains the meaning of French words, based on French Wiktionary. This is a monolingual French dictionary: words must be entered in French. Features: ♦ More than 168000 french definitions and large number of inflected forms ♦ Fast as it works offline, internet is used only when a word is not found in the offline dictionary ♦ You can leaf through words using your finger! ♦ Easy and functional user interface, optimized also for tablets ♦ Bookmarks and history with option to backup your bookmarks ♦ Crossword help: the symbol ? can be used in place of unknown letter ♦ Random search button (shuffle), useful to learn new words ♦ Compatible with Moon+ Reader and FBReader ♦ Themes with user defined text colors You can listen to the word pronunciation, provided that voice data have been installed in your phone (Text-to-speech engine). ⚠ The offline dictionary needs memory. In case your device has low memory, please consider to use the online dictionary: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=livio.dictionary Question & Answers: http://goo.gl/UnU7V Information about permissions used by the application can be found here: http://goo.gl/AsqT4C Information for application developers: ✔ This application provides Dictionary API for 3rd party developers, please read further details: http://thesaurus.altervista.org/dictionary-android This application requires the following permissions: INTERNET - to retrieve the definition of words WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE (aka Photos/Media/Files) - to backup configuration and bookmarks

description: The Transport for Ireland Real Time App is the only app that provides real time data for Dublin Bus, Bus Éireann, Luas and Irish Rail. The app is provided by the National Transport Authority in partnership with Dublin City Council Features: • Access Real Time Passenger information from Dublin Bus, Bus Éireann, Luas, Dart and Irish Rail Commuter and Intercity services. • See up to date information of when your Bus/Luas/Train will be at a Stop or Station • View Stops and Routes on a map and navigate through the map for additional stops and information. • Setup Favourites so that you can access the Real Time Passenger Information for your regular stops quickly. • Create Reminders to notify you when the bus is approaching your stop, or when you are near a certain bus stop. • Access Travel Updates for Dublin Bus/Bus Éireann/Luas and Irish Rail so that you can stay up to date. Please note: The National Real Time service is currently being improved and expanded in order to ensure more and more stops have real time data. We welcome your feedback about this app, via the “feedback” button on the app. The National Transport Authority is working with Bus Éireann to expand real time information to all Bus Éireann bus stops. Real Time Information for other bus operators will be incorporated into the app when such data becomes available.

description: More Friends, more fun, no fee* msngr is the popular Latin American chat service which has now gone global. msngr is about chat, pure and simple, but it does some things that make it stand out from the rest. ----------------------- Chat is better when everyone is included: Which is why msngr is now available to your friends and family living outside of Latin America. We also know that not everyone has a Smartphone, which is why msngr works on any phone with a browser and a data connection allowing almost everyone to connect and chat. ----------------------- Chat is better when it’s free: msngr understands what free really means, so when you chat using one of the mobile networks that love our service you won’t be charged for the data* *Please check out http://support.msngr.com for a full list of mobile networks and counties that offer free data for msngr. ----------------------- Chat is better in Groups: Which is why we’ve made group chat the heart of msngr, making it simple and easy to connect and chat in your friends and family groups. ----------------------- msngr gives you more to chat about: Introducing msngr Channels Beta, giving you the chance to discover and share great content from the worlds of sport, music, entertainment and news with friends and family. The msngr Channels Beta is available in Mexico initially, and will be made available to other countries during 2015. The msngr channel is available everywhere, keep tuned for the latest news and updates from the msngr team. ----------------------- Chat pure and simple: msngr makes it easy for you to discover and chat with your friends and family anywhere, at anytime. - msngr uses your phone contacts to see who else is connected and updates automatically when your contacts join. - With msngr you can send free invitations to your friends and family to join. - msngr lets you capture and share precious picture moments. ----------------------- msngr is about friend and family groups and we would like to invite you to join ours: Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/msngrchat We are also doing some fun stuff on Instagram which you can be part of: http://instagram.com/msngrchat Get sharing with us on Facebook too www.facebook.com/pages/msngr
release_text: msngr no longer requires Google Play Services to be installed on your phone. If you do not have Google Play Services then you may find that new message notifications after a period of inactivity could take up to 30 minutes to arrive. To receive immediate message notifications, Google Play Services can be installed via the settings menu in the msngr app. Minor bug fixes

description: Kids Launcher with Parental Control is a shell which prevents access to undesirable content, lets you set up time limits on using the app, tracks your child’s location, and much more. REMOTE PARENTAL CONTROL Remote Control is an additional app that has been developed specifically with the aim of empowering parents by enabling them to remotely control ( http://bit.ly/18re5ZA ) the settings on Kids Launcher with Parental Control, and also track their child's location. PARENTAL CONTROL AND KIDS SAFETY - Lets a child launch only the permited applications. - The access to buying options and launching of Google Play applications can be blocked. - The option of incoming/outcoming sms and calls can be blocked. - Prevent the device settings being changed. - Pin-code access to parental control settings and exit from the kids mode. TRACKING - Mapping your child’s current location (updated every 15 minutes). ★ Premium function: Child’s movement history for the past 12 hours. TIME LIMITS - The activity time for any application can be limited (for example, to 2 hours per day). - Ability to block a certain category or the entire device ★ Premium function: Setting up the apps' activity time schedule, for example: it can be launched from 13:00 to 21:00. ★ Premium function: Ability to specify separate time restriction settings for weekdays and weekends. INTERFACE The application is designed in a simple child-friendly way, which appeals to both kids and adults. You can let your child install any wallpaper on their own. DRAWER TOOL There are plenty of applications that allow you to draw on white paper, while in Kids Launcher only you can use the black one. For access just swipe the screen to the right. If you find an error in Kids Launcher with Parental Control or have a suggestion on improving the app, we would appreciate you contacting us. Become a Facebook fan: http://facebook.com/playpadapps Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/playpadapps Google +: https://plus.google.com/109110826139251588248 Become a VK fan: http://vk.com/playpadapps You can launch “Parental Control” by a single tap on your device. “Kids mode” will protect your settings and information storage from unauthorized access.

Cy-Bus Companion is a free app designed to provide everything you need in order to improve your experience using Cyprus buses, by providing you offline buses schedule, route, online direction from your location to any bus stop, providing you all bus stop location on a map for any bus line (online), notification center and many more. Cyrus Bus Companion include the following features: •Navigation (find the best bus line for your route) •Add Bus line in favorite up to 6 •Notification center (set any bus schedule time as a notification in order for the app to remind you 5 min before the bus start) •View all bus stop on the map from any bus line •Get directions from your location to any bus stop •Quick Home button (go to home with just a single click – for android 3.0 and above) •Quick Hotline call button for all major city •Possibility to enable or disable sound, vibration and notification light •Available for all major city in Cyprus (Nicosia, Larnaca, Limassol, Paphos, Famagusta) *****Optimized for High end devices with Full HD screens******
release_text: V1.3 *Several UI Change and Improvement *Removed Swipe on timetable, replaced with a tap to switch for more consistency *Added Ability to save last selected city in order to be set as default so that next time you start the app you won’t have to select again a city (Can be disable on Settings) *Minor bug Fix and Scrolling speed improvement

description: Toca la "G" para jugar por grados (años). Tarda entre 1 y 30 segundos en abrir, depende de tu teléfono o tablet. Juega gratis con esta app! Funciona en teléfonos y tablet's. Los retos comprenden las materias de matemáticas, español, ciencias naturales, historia, geografía y formación cívica y ética, los grados de tercero, cuarto, quinto y sexto. Tanto si eres niño, niña, o adulto, este es un reto fantástico para ti. Más y más preguntas y más sorpresas! Búscanos en google play como lunitsoft... Tap the "G" to play for degrees (years). It takes between 1 and 30 seconds to open, depending on your phone or tablet. Play for free with this app! Works on phones and tablet's. The challenges include the subjects of mathematics, Spanish, natural sciences, history, geography and civics and ethics, grades third, fourth, fifth and sixth. Whether you're a kid, child, or adult, this is a great challenge for you. More and more questions and more surprises! Find us on google play as lunitsoft ...

Chat with friends anytime, anywhere with Tictoc. Join 22million+ people who call, text and share on Tictoc, for free! Tictoc is available on mobile, PC and the web, so you never miss a thing. Unlock the power of being connected on the go. Join Tictoc with your friends and family. ---------------- • Free chat with your friends • Free domestic & international voice calls • Crystal clear call sound quality • Tictoc does not collect user chat history data. • 3G, 4G, and wi-fi access anytime, anywhere • Sending invite text message is FREE! • Send files, photos, stickers, videos, gifs, docs etc. • Access anywhere: mobile, web and computer. • You can simply login to Tictoc PC with your Facebook. ---------------- FEATURES: • Use on any device, seamlessly. Use Tictoc on your smartphone, tablet, and computer without missing a beat! • Automatic syncing to all devices. All your conversations and docs sync automatically. Like a good conversation, you only need to say something once. • Share and Save Anything, literally *anything*! We support Facebook Pictures, YouTube Videos, Dropbox files, Photos, PDFs, and much more! • Ultimate File Management with My Files to keep photos, videos, music, and every other formatted files neat, organized, and easily accessible on-the-go. Perfect for managing work, organizing meetings, and planning events. • Dropbox Integration - Instantly share your Dropbox files with your Tictoc friends by accessing your Dropbox from any chatroom. • Tictoc Clubs go beyond group chat. Create a ‘Club’ to share pictures and updates with groups of friends, co-workers, or others that share your interests. It’s the easiest way for everyone to stay in touch and up to date. • Sticker Studio - a fun, easy way to chat with pics! Transform any photo or video into stickers in our Sticker Studio to make your stickers fun, animated—even gifs. Use stickers anywhere you’d use an emoticon—chat, messaging, texting. ---------------- For user security and privacy we delete all chat history right after the message has been sent. User chat history is not stored on our server. ---------------- “Group text on steroids. Love it!” –Sam “Better than whatsapp, runs smooth with great design and easier ways to share media, clubs...see for yourself. Even registration process is better. It auto inputs the code.” –Matt Christiansen “Best app by far. Tictoc is probably the only app I have used every day / almost all day since downloading.” –Amber Loom ---------------------- Users are finding us with these keywords: tictoc,free sms,freecall,group chat,instant messenger,phonecall,tiktok,tik tok,loom,chatter,hangout,dropbox ---------------------- Have a comment or question? Please send us an e-mail: tictoc_android.etc@skplanet.com

You can customize the decent space layout to match your favorite colors and choose between different sounds for the metronome. Setting the tempo is really easy. Just tap the screen a few times to detect it automatically or enter it directly. Enjoy!

description: Our Pretty Pet series have a new and exciting game! Join Cuby and his uber great friends as they take a wild journey to matching shiny, colorful jewels and solve mind teasing puzzles! Gameplay: Swap any jewels with an adjacent one to form a chain of 3 or more jewels that look exactly alike! Get points for each matching set of jewels made – longer the combo, better the score. Special boosters are a great asset to solve impossible puzzles! They are the perfect companion for score fiends! You will have a chance to draw from a Gashapon machine after every quest. There are over hundreds of unique collectibles up for grab. Dress up your room with these fabulous collectibles today and make your friends jealous when they visit! ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

description: Esse aplicativo tem por finalidade auxiliar no envio de SMS tornando mais fácil, você envia um SMS e o aplicativo mantém gravado a mensagem assim quando você for enviar a mesmo mensagem basta seleciona-la na lista e enviar para quem você quiser é simples e rápido. A mensagem envia também vai para as mensagens enviadas no seu celular, assim você sabe exatamente pra quem enviou. Você também pode enviar a mensagem para quantos números desejar, e pode selecionar os números na sua lista de contatos. 1. Clique em "Novo SMS". 2. Insira o(s) número(s) que desejar. Obs. O(s) número(s) pode(m) ser selecionados na lista de contatos clicando em "Buscar nos contatos". 3. Insira a Mensagem e clique em enviar. 4. Ao voltar para a tela inicial a sua mensagem já estará na lista. Para seleciona o(s) contato(s) marque a caixa na lateral (quantos você desejar) e clique em selecionar. Para enviar a mensagem novamente basta clicar na mensagem que aparece na lista inicial e selecionar a opção enviar, depois insira o(s) número(s) e envie. This application is intended to assist in sending SMS making it easier, you send an SMS application and thus maintains recorded the message when you send the same message simply select it from the list and send to anyone you want is simple and quick. The message will also send to the messages sent to your phone, so you know just who sent it. You can also send the message to as many numbers as you want, and you can select the numbers in your contact list. 1. Click "New SMS". 2. Insert (s) number (s) you want. The Note (s) number (s) (s) can be selected from the contact list by clicking "Search contacts". 3. Enter the message and click send. 4. Returning to your home screen message is already in the list. To select the (s) contact (s) check the box on the side (as you want) and click select. To send the message again just click the message that appears on the initial list and select the option to send, then enter the number (s) (s) and send.

*** SALE IN CELEBRATION OF WORLD CUP 2014 - UP TO 70% OFF *** *** EQUIVALENT TO APPROX 2.14 BRAZILIAN REAL *** by Nyarlu Labs Fresh from critical acclaim on iOS,your mission is simple: USE THE MAGNET TO ATTRACT THE RAZOR TO SHAVE THE FACE! Pixelly arcade action. How to play: The magnet follows your touch around the screen. The razor is drawn towards the magnet. Cut hairs with the razor whilst trying not to nick your eyes, nose and mouth. Popping a pimple will temporarily reverse the magnet's polarity, causing the razor to be repelled. Make good use of the multiplier, powerups and scoring system for MASSIVE POINTS! Two shaving modes: * Classic mode. The old family favourite. Shave once, shave fast. Try to finish before your beard starts growing again. * Score Attack. Grab powerups, raise the multiplier, collect fruit. You have three minutes to score as many points as you can without fainting from blood loss. Bonus game mode! * Space Surfing. Endless and randomly generated. Be a penguin, surfing on a razor, in space. Collect rings and powerups, smash asteroids, share food with friendly space penguins.. Don't get hit by comets. Twirl/bump/shoot 'em up. Complete with original 8-bit chiptune soundtrack. Please email us with questions or feedback. Try our other awesome HD & 3D Games. Whether you want a puzzle, arcade, action, strategy or casual game, we've something entertaining for you: * In TileStorm highly addictive puzzles of path construction against the clock are great brain training as you guide Eggbot the Robot through a jungle of challenges. Pocket gold coins in TileStorm Eire as you need to slide the tiles to guide our robo hero from spire to castle on an Irish adventure in another beautiful brain teaser. Or bag a jewel or two in TileStorm Polar in a super new Tile Storm story. Free Lite version [Massive Hadron] * Fight for survival over a night in the city with a gun & torch as your only defense (defence) against an angry zombie hoard in Aftermath XHD. Attack or run? It's your choice. [Two Heads] * Glide through the air like a paper plane (or the birds!) as you race flying at high speed from tower to tower in Ground Effect Pro X HD. Enjoy virtual physics, acceleromoter control and stereoscopic 3D. [Glenn Corpes] * Be truly challenged by Denki Blocks! Deluxe which The Sunday Times called “a Tetris for the 21st century" * Slice, dice, cut, chop, pop and flick blobs of color goo in Mixt. Includes bonus MP3 music track by DJ Shur-i-kan to enjoy as you mix the bubbles of coloured paint [Uprising] * Fun for kids and all the family alike. Farm fruit in Frootrees as you flick, throw and toss the Froot to harvest them using your poker skills to balance risk & reward. Just a hint of south park. Or try the Freaky Halloween Edition [Tin Man] * Be a cool snowboard ninja and smash the course record in Snow Dude. Don't tank your jump! [Lycette Bros] * A retro glow awaits you in Spirit - carve space with your touch * For sports fans, check out Big Cup Cricket and Big Hit Baseball FREE from our friends at Beautiful Game Studios. Small Print: VAT added if bought within EU. Game may require license from Google and collect anonymous stats for quality purposes. If u get error "Unknown reason -18", please email us or google for solution. Dev tested on devices from HTC, Samsung, Motorola, Sony Ericsson incl Xperia Play, Droid, Galaxy & Desire Z.
release_text: * Improved audio quality * Performance improvements to be more consistent across all devices * Many other miscellaneous improvements.

description: A safe, simple and free weight conversion application. Conversions made easy! Mark units as favorites and start converting values right away! Do quick conversions between: grams (g) kilograms (kg) tonnes (metric, uk, usa) newton hundredweight oz (ounce) pounds (lbs, lb) grain stone Simply type the numeric value into the text field, and wait for the keyboard to disappear. The converted values should all appear after the value was set. You may repeat this process to do multiple conversions. This app can be used for almost anything related to weight e.g. cooking, physics, engineering, exercise, weight loss its practical application is basically endless. You can also make use of the web version of this app: http://www.meerkathut.com/webapps/weight_conversion/ For more information and news please visit our website: http://www.meerkathut.com Please note: The calculated values are only accurate within certain number ranges. This product does not guarantee the accuracy or correctness any of its results, please use the results at own risk. We do collect anonymous usage-data (non-personal anonymous data).
release_text: * Security & framework update * Can now Favorite Units * Adding shortcuts to other unit conversions

Mix and match backgrounds, icons, change colors, apply filters, and more. ✔ Create your own icon - Long-press an ICON and select ‘Create’ menu, then you can design the icon in your style. ✔ Hide app names - Go ‘Home Screen’ menu in ‘Launcher Setting’ then you can hide app names ✔ Adjust icons’ layout - Go ‘Home Screen’ menu in ‘Launcher Setting’ then you will find ‘Grid Setting’. You can set the layout from 3*3 to 6*6. ✔ Lock widgets and icons on Homescreen - Go ‘Home Screen’ menu in ‘Launcher Setting’ and check ‘Lock screen’, then you can have your homescreen locked. ✔ Multi wallpaper setting - If your theme is a multi-wallpaper theme, You can set the images and order of appearance. - Go ‘Theme Setting’ menu and find ‘Set theme’ menu. ✔ How to set the theme - Long-press on the homescreen or just touch the home menu button, then you can use the ‘Theme Setting’ menu. ★ About Launcher Planet ★ Speed Up Your Phone! With simple, fast, and reliable service, anyone can have a personally customized mobile HOME. ✔ Service Card: Personalized Full Screen Widgets for quick access to Contacts, Weather, and more. Page Layout - letter shape, paragraph shape, Drop cap, - style - line number setting on/out, line orientation on/out - outline on/out - increase/decrease the level 6. page - page setting - vertical writing, border/background - header, footer, account number, - hide current page, line number - page division, section division, multi-section setting - section setting, section division 7. etc - mouse, keyboard(including shortcut) supported ■ Supported Formats - Open : HWP, HWT, HML, HWPX - Save : HWP, HWT, HML, HWPX, PDF ■ Languages Korean, English ■ Notice - After installing, the network connection should be needed for the authorization. description: FamilySearch Tree makes it easy and convenient for existing FamilySearch.org Family Tree users to view and edit the details of their family trees, plus add new persons, photos, text and audio stories to their family branches. Feel a compelling connection with your ancestors as you discover the important events and stories of their lives. As your heart turns to them, begin to collect and add your own favorite family memories to the tree for others to enjoy for generations to come. Share your family legacy with others in person or through popular social networks. • Browse your family branches, and see portraits of relatives you’ve never seen before. • Discover facts, documents, stories, photos, and recordings about your ancestors. • Easily add new persons and add photos stories and audio about your relatives. • Take your family tree with you wherever you go—the app works even without Internet access. • The app automatically syncs to FamilySearch.org, so you can pick up where you left off on any device. • Store your family branches for free forever, deep within the FamilySearch vaults. Share family stories with your children at bedtime or in the car while traveling. Learn something new about your family origins while waiting in a line. Take the app to family gatherings, and capture stories you’ve never heard before. Ask your parents and grandparents to tell you about their lives and what they remember of their deceased relatives; then record their stories using the app. Use important moments of your history as teaching aids. Watch how stories of your ancestors’ hardships, endurance, and faith help you become a better person. FamilySearch Tree is always free and an easy and convenient way to find and share meaningful, heart-turning family stories that will make an impact on your life and the lives of your loved ones. ============================== IMPORTANT NOTES:  • FamilySearch Tree is a mobile companion to FamilySearch.org. Along with making it easy to add photos, stories, and audio recordings to the records of ancestors in the tree, Family Tree now provides for the user to add new persons and edit the vital information for all ancestors in the public tree. • All content you provide for deceased ancestors is publicly visible. See our privacy policy for more details.
release_text: Improved stability and fixed some bugs. *** ATTENTION: As of March 1, 2015, FamilySearch will ONLY support Android OS version 4.x and above.

This Find My iPhone app finally allows you to find the location of your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch or Mac from an Android device! If you have misplaced your tablet or phone, simply login to this app to locate it; shows the location of your devices on a map . If you've misplaced your device near you, press the 'Play Sound' button to have the device play an audible alert , whether or not on silent mode. If your device has been lost, you can now activate lost mode (on compatible devices) or remotely lock older devices. Lost mode allows you to remotely lock your device with the pin/password that is already set. If a pin has not been set-up, this app. will prompt you to enter a new one. You can optionally add a phone number and a message to be displayed on the lost device’s lock screen. If your phone is found by someone, they can call you from the device. The app communicates directly with iCloud servers to find the location of your device. keywords: find iphone, find ipad, find ipod, find my mac, find idevices, find Apple devices, findappledevices, findmyiphone, icloud, find my phone, find my iphone, find my apple phone
release_text: Version 1.2.4 prevents a user from accidentally logging out by pressing the back key unless the "auto logout" is selected. Improved error handling. When a user has attempted to log in too frequently, the user name is temporarily locked out by Apple. In the previous versions, the message - "User ID or password is wrong" is shown. In v1.2.4, when this happens, the correct error message will be shown to remind the user that the user name has been disabled.

description: Yolo and happy go lucky. Life is short, better spend most of it on a board, right? If skateboarding is in your blood, then put away your skateboard and sit down for this one of a kind skateboarding game. You have never played anything like this before.You can bet your skate trucks on that! Did you know that skateboarding was invented by bored surfers? You do now! At first they put some wheels on wooden boxes. Can you imagine? These days you can build your own custom board with trunks, rails, wheels and awesome painted decks. Alright, so what’s this game about? Simply put: get your skater (unlock them all!) from point A to point B without crashing, dashing, slamming or ramming into objects. However! You get more points when you complete courses in style. Tail grabs, methods, nose grabs and 360’s will earn you extra points. So, this all sounds amazing and what not, but please tell us how does one play this game?! Well, that’s actually quite simple, honestly. Follow these steps and you will be able to complete all 75 levels. 1. Tap to jump, for points 2. Slide mid-air to perform insane stunts, for points 3. Hold to duck, to stay alive If that’s not cool enough for you, we also offer some top notch achievements, like dying 5, 15 or even 50 times! There’s also a reward for performing jumps. If that doesn’t keep you motivated, I don’t know what will! All this goodness is covered in a juicy, lean back skating saus. Relaxing vibes in the background and a sketchy look and feel will enhance your boarding experience. It’s about the Yolo (You only life once). Stunts are for adrenaline junkies who want to feel the thrill of jumping over a ice cream cart or sliding under a container. Just like real skating, this free skateboarding game is all about falling on your face and getting back up again. Nobody became a pro by just ‘doing it once’. You have to put some effort into your moves. A badly timed move will hurt, every guy knows that! But there’s no time feel sorry. Get back on that horse. I mean board. And try some new insane stunts. Make your surfing ancestors proud and impress your friends. Surfers came up with skateboarding when there were no waves. We came up with Skateboarding Pro: Yolo! for those times when it’s snowing, raining or just too hot to bust a move. Alright, i bet you are all very impressed and can’t wait to try the game out yourselves. Yolo! Please give us some support by rating our game on Google Play or following us on: Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/VascoGames Twitter - https://twitter.com/VascoGames

CereProc has developed the world's most advanced text to speech technology. Our voices not only sound real, they have character, making them suitable for any application that requires speech output. This voice can synthesize: * Navigation directions from Google Navigation while driving * Accessibility information with Talkback * Twitter, Facebook and newsfeeds with iHearNetwork * Your favourite eBook from eBook reader apps * Your SMS with apps like Handcent SMS or Drive Carefully * and many other TTS-enabled apps Please note that for some applications such as Google Navigation, we recommend installing on a device with at least a 1GHz processor. You can try the William voice for yourself, in the interactive demo on CereProc's homepage: http://www.cereproc.com

description: Dragon's Vape opened it's doors to the general public in March of 2014, and is located minutes away from New Orleans in Metairie, LA. Owned and operated by native New Orleanians, Dragon's Vape provides a cozy, relaxing atmosphere with quality products from starter kits to mechanical mods, and six different high quality e-juice lines which rated in VPR Magazine's Top 20 E-Liquid Lines. Whether you're new to vaping, or a veteran vaper...we're here to help. If it's your first beginner unit, or first mechanical mod we explain everything step-by-step! We do rebuilds here at the shop, and have a tasting bar with over 60 flavors that we are continuing to expand.

"A good set of extra activities related to story. The option to record your own narration. Multiple language versions included in the price. Ease of use. No distracting elements." (AppySmart) "A series of beautiful stories for children to delve into a world familiar, reassuring and colorful. Kids may ask for more! Fortunately, they have choice." (ViPad.fr) ******************************** Based on the well-known collection of books "Little Boy" (over 500,000 books sold each year), the application "Oscar's police car" features a fun, interactive story, giving kids a chance to find out in a playful way what it's like to be a cop. The bank was trashed... Speed in pursuit of the baddies with Oscar and his police car! Look for the sounds and interactive animations on the screen, then record your own voice instead of that of the narrator. Give your answers to the quiz and play with the jigsaw puzzles and the coloring books. And finally, why don't you take a picture of yourself in Oscar's police car? "Oscar's police car" is a story where your child can identify with the hero and let his imagination wander. • Interactive story for preschoolers • Voices and texts in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Polish. • Read or listen • Record your own voice! • Snap yourself in the car! • Quiz about Oscar's story • 5 jigsaw puzzles, 3 levels • 5 coloring books. Find out about the other applications in the Little Boy's collection: Bo’s boat – Little Boy Oscar's police car - Little Boy Roger's helicopter - Little Boy Sandy's taxi - Little Boy Walter's scooter - Little Boy Wayne's train - Little Boy Harvey's RV - Little Boy Shane's Plane - Little Boy Jett's space rocket - Little Boy Jett's space rocket - Little Boy: The game. Find out about the other applications in the Little Hero collection: Super-Hero - Little Hero : The game The cow-boy - Little Hero The pirate - Little Hero.
release_text: - New language : Italian - New icon - Minor bugs fixed.

description: Schulte tables are usually applied to research and development of mental rate of perception, in particular speeds of visual roughly-search movements. Also it used in speed reading training. Rules of work with Schulte tables: Find and click figures silently, in an increasing order from 1 to 25 (without omission). The found figures are specified only by a sight. As a result of such training time of reading of one table should be no more than 25 sec. Before the beginning of work with the table the sight is fixed in its centre to see the table entirely. By search of figures following one after another fixing of eyes only in the table centre is authorised. Horizontal movements of eyes are forbidden. Distance from the table to eyes same, as well as at reading of the usual text, i.e. About 25-30 sm. Time and periodicity of trainings establish, remembering that it is not necessary to overtire. While working with Schulte tables it is necessary to remember that training here not the aim. The main thing — expansion of a field of vision that can be reached by accurate following the rules of work with tables, the regular and realised trainings.
release_text: + Added support for legacy models 240x320 + Avoid pausing sound of other applications like music players

description: Con Chistes Buenos podrás pasar un rato divertido leyendo chistes cortos y largos en Español. O también podrás escucharlos pulsando en el botón Play y se reproducirá el chiste con una voz muy divertida. Puedes mandarnos tus chistes y serán publicados en la aplicación así tus amigos verán tus chistes divertidos. Estos chistes los puedes enviar y compartir desde la aplicación de una manera muy rápida a tus amigos. Puedes compartirlos por whatsapp, line, tuenti, Facebook, bluetooth, email, mensajería, etc. Aprovecha esta aplicación gratuita para divertirte con tus amigos y familiares. También disponible para tablets. With Jokes Buenos You can have a fun time reading long and short jokes in Spanish. Or you can listen by clicking on the Play button and the joke is played with a funny voice. You can send us your jokes and will be posted on the application so your friends will see your funny jokes. These jokes can send and share the application from a very fast way to friends. You can share these whatsapp, line, Tuenti, Facebook, bluetooth, email, messaging, etc.. Take advantage of this free application to have fun with your family and friends. Also available for tablets.

description: Уважаемые пользователи, в связи с большой популярностью нашего приложения и значительным увеличением нагрузки на сервис, мы разделили телеканалы на платные и бесплатные. Бесплатные телеканалы доступны для просмотра всем без исключения пользователям. Подписка на платные телеканалы, на данный момент, доступна только для абонентов Интернета «Летай» от компании Таттелеком. Возможность подписки для остальных пользователей будет реализована в ближайшем будущем. «Летай ТВ» – это приложение, которое превратит Ваш смартфон или планшет в полноценный телевизор. Теперь вы никогда не пропустите любимую телепередачу или важный момент футбольного матча, а время, проведенное в дороге или очередях, пролетит незаметно. «Летай ТВ» работает как в мобильных сетях 3G/4G, так и по Wi-Fi. Пожалуйста помните, что использование мобильного интернета для просмотра ТВ, может повлечь дополнительные расходы на трафик. Эту информацию вы можете уточнить у своего провайдера мобильного интернета. Dear customers, due to the great popularity of our application and a significant increase in the load on the service, we shared channels on both free and paid. Free TV channels available for viewing to all users. Subscription to pay TV, at the moment, is only available to subscribers of the Internet "Fly" from Tattelecom. The ability to subscribe to other users will be implemented in the near future. "Fly TV" - is an application that will turn your smartphone or tablet into a full-fledged TV. Now you will never miss your favorite TV show or an important moment of a football match, and the time spent on the road or lines, fly by. "Fly TV" works as in mobile networks 3G / 4G, and on Wi-Fi. Please remember that the use of mobile internet for watching TV, may incur additional costs for traffic. This information, you can check with your provider of mobile Internet.
